name: Tales of Phantasia
description: The Game Boy Advance version of Tales of Fantasia was based on the Playstation versions of the game, including the PlayStation remake's character voices, reduced enemy encounter rate and gameplay tweaks, but uses the original opening and two-dimensional world map.

name: Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath - Vengance of the Slayer
description: So.... got what it takes to be a X Slayer?!?... 7 weapons, blood and gore, twisted music by Seepage & Psyko Syndikate, and maps where you can blow up everything. its awesome. started making it in 1998 in high school with my friend and now im 37, so i have life experience now.

name: Halo Infinite: Season 2 - Lone Wolves
description: Lone Wolves, gear up for Season 2 of Halo Infinite! Experience fresh content including new maps, modes, themed limited-time events, and an all-new Battle Pass that never expires.

name: Quake: Nyarlathotep
description:
One of Dustin "Tronyn" Geeraert's best solo works.
Two medium-sized experimental vertical maps with a unique flesh-temple theme and very uncompromising low-gravity gameplay. Tronyn shows his love for Lovecraftian tales in this map pack; Nyarlathotep exploits the abyss, cosmic horror, and abstraction, all at once in its level design.

name: Quake: Egyptoagula
description: Egyptoagula is a Large Egyptian-themed space map by Qmaster, with floating pyramids of surrealist dimensions, oases, and traps in elaborate mazes. While the map itself is short, built like a Rubik's cube in many aspects, with intertwined puzzles opening abstract moving parts of its mechanical pyramids. It runs on the Keep mod and includes a patch for it. This map should last an experienced player at least an hour on the first playthrough.

name: Quake: Carved in Flesh
description:
Carved in Flesh is an early 2003 collection of three unique new levels as you make your way across night-lit terrain and enter an epic gothic castle.
A very fresh theme was created with Fakk2 and Quake3 textures.
A partial conversion with ten new custom monsters and three powerful new weapons. Alongside this bestiary, almost all Quake monsters have been modified, either with a new skin, improved AI, or a new arsenal.

name: Tales of Phantasia
description: The iOS version was released in 2013 and is based on the GBA version of Tales of Phantasia. The version is free-to-play but is different from other versions in removing some save points and relying heavily on an in-app purchase system, with the English version using an orchestrated piece, much like the GBA version.

name: Factropy
description: A factory simulation game full of genre tropes, plus a bunch of ideas a solo developer failed to mod into other games. A mix tape!

name: Quake: Operation Urth Majik
description: Operation: Urth Majik is an early single-player episode with five medium to large IKBase/Quake2/Egyptian-themed, professionally constructed maps, new monsters/weapons, and progs including cutscenes - by an all-star Team of mappers: FatController, Tyrann, Tronyn, and Apollo. This map pack included narration, weapon from the DOOM series, and a Quake 2/Half-Life ambiance.

name: Crash Bandicoot Action Pack
description: Crash Bandicoot Action Pack is a bundle containing Crash Nitro Kart, Crash Twinsanity, and Crash Tag Team Racing.

name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion: The Sunset Station Update
description: The Sunset Station update features a rogue-lite infinite train dungeon known as the Limitless Line that has you battle new and upgraded familiar enemies for a bevy of rewards. The Limitless Line features vast prizes for doing well in the dungeon, including special Trinkets that aid you during runs. While on the train, you will encounter swarms of foes and much more.

name: Monster Fight
description: Monster Fight is a play to earn blockchain game. The monsters level up in Adventure and PvP modes. You can apply skills and continue to climb the ranks. Monster Fight uses 3 monsters to play and you can build up those monsters with different skills or level them up to earn more.

name: Chernobyl: Origins
description: "Chernobyl: Origins" - is a quest game with psychological horror elements. You have to solve a lot of puzzles to find out the terrible secret of the catastrophe at the nuclear power plant. The game will take you to 1986, to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant.

name: Unlock Kimono Cuties
description: This game is a casual game. Various interactive items: most items in each scene can be interacted with. Players need to find the correct items in the scene to give to the NPC according to the needs of the NPC.

name: Hillmain Hotel
description: Escape Hillmain Hotel before the malevolent forces within consume you.

name: Roly Poly
description: Play as a Roly Poly and roll into adventure!

name: Firekeep
description: Firekeep is a minimalist, relaxing strategy game about building a tiny, sustainable city in the cold void of space. Build, combine and upgrade dozens of unique buildings to overcome procedurally-generated islands and keep your fire burning.

name: Immortal Mantis
description: Discover secrets, solve puzzles and survive the serial-killer in this pixelated topdown. You are Akin, an exterminator, who bought a house in a rural area, but the past of this house will affect your present.

name: Between Two Stars
description: Between Two Stars is a 2D procedurally generated space exploration game. Players take control of a starship, as part of a simulation on behalf of the Orpheus Corporation and explore the Sierra Galaxy to discover new worlds and new materials with which to trade, craft and build bases.

name: Tamashi Party
description: Ghosts have a hard life so come out of your coffins and face your friends. Take advantage of the chaos to surprise, push, trap and unleash hell on them. No Eternal Rest for losers in Tamashi Party.

name: Among Walls
description: Kiara Bell is a young intrepid explorer who is not afraid to embark on dangerous journeys around the world to find and uncover ancient secrets and artifacts in mysterious tombs.

name: Hungry Animals
description: Give donuts to hungry animals! Make a lot of donuts for the animals according to the order in which they are cooked. Good Luck!

name: SeaWolf VR
description: Dive into the deep virtual waters and become a SeaWolf. Shoot your missiles and torpedoes at hostile submarines, minesweepers and tankers, actively avoid depth charges and enemy torpedoes, use defensive shield while trying to protect sea animals.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Technology
description: Puzzles about Technology!

name: Monobehevo
description: This is a very tired person after work. He decided to make a game that can pass customs in one night.

name: Uno: Assassin's Creed Valhalla Theme Cards
description: Play your favorite card game like a Viking in UNO Valhalla DLC, inspired by the world of Assassin’s Creed Valhalla.

name: House 3D: Move and Unpack
description: Sin descripción

name: Orcs Must Die! 3 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Revenant Saga & Revenant Dogma
description: Experience epic RPG adventures at once! This bundle includes Revenant Saga and Revenant Dogma.

name: Minarchy: Active Shooter
description: Minarchy: Active Shooter is a 2D Top-Down Shooter blended with Bullet Hell and just a splash of Tower Defense - all based on the Minarchy Tabletop Role-Playing Game. This is the first video game project created by the Cloud Sprout game company.

name: Curley Laboratory
description: In a facility, scientists are creating a vaccine called "The Red Vine" but it becomes unstable. It causes a breach with unknown Anomalies. You must find an exit to escape the laboratory from the creatures around you in the dark. Are you brave enough to survive?

name: Card Girl Army II
description: Card Girl Army II is a cartoon-style turn-based card game. Each card has different abilities and attributes. In the game, you can choose different formations to fight, and the formation can increase the attributes of the cards. Players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: Lead the Way
description: In this charming maze game, you play as Bob, a sweet but shy blob. While strolling through the forest with their partner, they end up losing themselves in a mysterious maze… It is now up to you to help them reunite with their partner.

name: Porcupine's Fate: Chapter 1
description: Porcupine's Fate is an atmospheric first-person sci-fi horror shooter with puzzles, mysteries, and melancholic undertones. This is Chapter 1 in a six-chapter game.

name: Galactic Assault Squad
description: Galactic Assault Squad is an open-world action-combat co-op MMO from the co-creator of Realm of the Mad God.

name: Moonshot: A Journey Home
description: Moonshot: A Journey Home is a physics-based puzzle game where you play as Moon Pi, a young moon separated from Mother Earth. Using slingshot mechanics and navigational puzzles, help Moon Pi trek across the mysterious universe to finally get back home.

name: Captive
description: Sin descripción

name: Dual Chroma: Far Shore
description:
Do you hear that voice that calls out to your heart?

Dual Chroma: Far Shore is a short otome game taking place in the fantasy world of Aradal; a rich land with a storied history you can begin to explore. Choose your pronouns and play as an islander living at the edge of the world, enjoying spending your days on lush beaches with a handsome stranger. Your choices and personality will shape how Kassian, the mysterious traveler, views you.

name: Drömjobbet i Rosemond Valley
description: In this business game the player plays as Josephine who is given the task to run her own mall.

name: Catan
description: The 2007 Xbox Live Arcade release of Catan, developed by Big Huge Games.

name: Shin Hayarigami: Ghost
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Hayarigami: Pandemic
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Hayarigami: Parasite
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Hayarigami: Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake: Five Rivers Land
description: Five Rivers is a campaign in DOOM 3 hell-style, made by JPL for Quake in 2007. This episode has three small to medium-sized, dark, and scary maps, featuring new enemies, ambient sounds, and Doom 3 textures.

name: Kirby: Revenge of Dream Land
description: Tougher levels, tougher enemies, tougher everything! This mod of Kirby's Return to Dreamland increases the difficulty tenfold in order to create an experience for Kirby veterans looking for a challenge.

name: The Ultimate Doom: Knee-Deep in Zdoom
description:
Knee-Deep in ZDoom (also known by the abbreviation KDiZD) is a ten-level PK3 for The Ultimate Doom, designed for use with the ZDoom source port. The project was led by Daniel Gimmer (Tormentor667). It was first released on June 2, 2007, and at the 2007 ceremony it picked up a regular Cacoward as well as the Mordeth award. The final version of the mod was uploaded on June 16, 2012.

The PWAD is a reinterpretation of the original id Software's Knee-Deep in the Dead. A core concept of the mod was to expand the original levels by making full use of the power of Marisa Heit (Randi)'s ZDoom port, which adds features that are not possible under the original Doom engine. The levels have an atmosphere and design similar to Quake 2, with large tech bases and similar ambient sounds.

name: Quake: A Roman Wilderness of Pain
description: An episode consisting of three large levels and a start map by Tronyn and PM. The maps follow an evil metal-Egyptian-flesh texture theme and include many modified and new monsters, new items, and weapons as well as other custom codes (arwop.txt). The episode also features background music inspired by The Doors (can be turned off with "impulse 17") and a hidden fifth difficulty mode. The gameplay is fast and very hard, blending in with the strong 'Doom vibe' it conveys - especially the boss battle is extremely tough.

name: Mappa Imperium
description: A Worldbuilding pen & paper game

name: MicroBuddies
description: MicroBuddies is a blockchain strategy game centered around GOO producing Microbes who can be used to create rarer Microbes who produce even more GOO. Compete or cooperate with other GOO farmers to build a GOO empire!

name: Changa
description: A psychedelic trial-by-fire journey to sever the knot of suffering. Mastery in movement and combat will be needed on this path to inner peace. Bounce, dodge, fly, and fight the illusions of material and immaterial reality in this new kind of bullet hell.

name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu Portable
description: Sin descripción

name: Finder Love: Hoshino Aki - Nangoku Trouble Rendezvous
description: Sin descripción

name: Finder Love: Hara Fumina - Futari no Futari de...
description: Sin descripción

name: Finder Love: Kudo Risa - First Shoot ha Kimi to
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sword of Ares for Quake
description:
The Sword of Ares is a 1998 unlicensed total conversion for Quake.

The game adds several features not available in vanilla Quakes, such as the ability to switch to a third-person view (which may be a bit buggy) and several selectable player skins.

The Sword of Ares was made of free content but was distributed as shareware. It appears that the registered version (as a separate PAK file) was eventually made available by the author as a free download too, as it can be found on PlanetQuake mirrors alongside the shareware release. It is an unofficial commercial total conversion, whether it was licensed by id Software is unclear.

The game retailed at $9.99 on their official website.

name: Final Profit: A Shop RPG
description: FINAL PROFIT is a story driven shop-sim RPG. Gather products and find customers. Spend your hard-earned profits on upgrades and investments. Make far-reaching choices as you expand your business. And explore a world full of secrets on your quest to defeat capitalism by becoming the best at it!

name: Quake: The Final Descent
description:
The Final Descent is an ambitious early 2000 Episode for Quake by Hellscrag.
The Final Descent is an Episode with nine medium to large maps (including a secret map) in varying styles - Base/Wizard/Metal - with many caverns and fortresses, and a few new monsters and new weapons. This map should last an experienced player 2 hours of playtime.

name: Exmortis
description: You wake up in the woods with no memory of how you got there. Nightmares of blood and screams still echo through your mind. It's late and it's cold - unless you can find shelter fast, you won't last the night. You spot a house in a clearing up ahead and left with no choice - you decide to shelter there for the night. Soon afteryou begin to realise that death is a welcome choice compared to what lies waiting for you inside...

name: Quake: Retro Jam Egyptian
description:
Retro Jam - Egyptian is the sixth Retro Jam organized at Func_Msgboard - featuring 17 small to medium-sized Egyptian-themed levels by various authors. It comes with custom visuals for the items and several skyboxes. Retro Jams are map packs designed for vanilla Quake and can be played with an unmodified engine.

This map pack is one of the biggest ever made, at 52615 Kilobytes, lasting up to six hours of playtime.

name: Quake: Retro Jam Windtunnel
description: Fifth "retro" map jam held at Func_Msgboard, following an E3M5/The Wind Tunnels theme, resulting in seven small to medium-sized levels. Retro Jams are made to be played with a vanilla engine and require no modification.

name: Royal Thumble
description: Welcome to the Thumb Tournament! Several hooded thumbs are fighting for the coveted Royal Thumble title. Let the battle begin!

name: Bullet Time Fighting
description: A Matrix-inspired martial arts fighting game.

name: Delta Particles
description:
Delta Particles is a single-player, story-driven, total conversion modification for Half-Life 1.

Features include a new single-player campaign consisting of 4 chapters, total conversion, a lot of new content, the atmosphere of the new scientific complex "Delta Base", new weapons, a new Dark Ambient soundtrack and a BlueShift-style XEN level.

name: Half-Nuked
description:
Half-Nuked is a mod for Half-Life allowing you to play as Duke Nukem, the king himself.
New features include brand new voice lines, 3D weapons from Duke Nukem 3D, and an all-new soundtrack. The core mechanics stays the same, traveling through Black Mesa during the events of the Resonance Cascade.

name: Half-Life: Field Intensity
description: Half-Life: Field Intensity is a mod for the original Half-Life (1998) that has been in the works for 13 years. You play as HECU soldier Stefan Oldfield who was sent to the Black Mesa Research Facility to silence the scientists working there after the resonance cascade. It features 5-10 hours of game-play and 34 maps in total.

name: Half-Life: The Infected
description: Enjoy a new 28 Map Half-Life campaign. Take the role of Gerald Backman, an industrial electrician interning at Black Mesa at the time of the resonance cascade. Face off against all the enemies from the Opposing Force.

name: Half-Life: Hazardous Course 2
description: The Hazardous-Course 2 is a spoof of the original "Hazard-Course" from Half-Life, which resembles the first player training levels. Contrary to this, the Hazardous Course, as its name let's suggest, is much more dangerous. Although it's a mod for a first-person shooter, the player can only wield a weapon at the designated target range. So it plays more like an adventure. The difficulty is quite challenging, but the rewards are accordingly. The Basic Training is peppered with hidden Secrets, which reveal tools, shortcuts, control rooms, and other features, to ease almost all challenges. There are two Secret Levels and one Bonus Level to discover and complete to access the final part of the Hazardous Course.

name: Half-Life: Zombie Edition
description: Zombie Edition is a mod based on the original Half-Life concept, but you will play as a headcrab and, what is more interesting, as a zombie. Zombies can mutate into three types to change their characteristics and each type will have at least six upgrades, including new weapons and abilities.

name: Starshine Legacy Episode 1: Mystery of the Soul Riders
description: Mystery of the Soulriders follows four girls as they combat evil forces in their town through the power of friendship; both with each other, and with their magical talking horses. The game opens with Lisa, on her first day of school, helping the horse Starshine ride again. But who is the old man Mr. Sands, and why does Starshine feel pain whenever he is near?

name: Quake: Retro Jam Koohoo
description:
A pack of 10 Koohoo themed Mesoamerican temple maps made in two weeks, for vanilla Quake. A custom start map is included, and a map source is included.
This map pack should last an experienced player two to three hours.

name: Starshine Legacy Episode 2: Secret of Pine Hill Mansion
description: You play as Linda, a show jumper. Linda is torn between school and show jumping and finds out one day that she has supernatural abilities. She can talk to her horse Meteor and learns of an old secret. Discover the truth together with Linda and her friends.

name: Starshine Legacy Episode 3: Legend of Pandoria
description: Anne is a young girl with big dreams - she wants to become a model and a successful dressage rider. What seems like the opportunity of a lifetime arises when a famous perfume company comes to her school scouting for their next model. little does she know that this is the beginning of an adventure that will take her and her trusted horse Concorde into another world. The time has come for Anne and Concorde to overcome their fears and face their destiny in the Starshine Legacy.

name: Starshine Legacy Episode 4: The Riddle of Dark Core
description: Alex is having trouble with the teachers at school when her bullied brother James call her for help. The bully Katja agrees with leaving James alone if Alex can beat her in the old Scarecrow Race upon Scarecrow Hill. Alex agrees to race with her horse Tin-Can, but she is soon forced to learn more about her and her friends newfound powers when James mysteriously disappears the very next day.

name: Initial D Arcade Stage 3
description:
Initial D Arcade Stage Ver. 3, known internationally as Initial D Version 3, is a 2004 racing arcade game developed by Sega Rosso and published by Sega Corporation. It was developed for the Sega NAOMI 2 arcade system, marking the last in the series to be developed on the system, and was later ported to the PlayStation Portable in 2006 as Initial D Street Stage. It is the third game in the Initial D Arcade Stage series.
Two new courses have been added: Shomaru Pass and Tsuchisaka, both of which were featured in Initial D Special Stage, as well as the option to race on Akina in the snow. Three new rivals have been added: Miki, Ichijo (known as Man in Evo VI) , and Aikawa (known as Man in Evo V).
New cars featured in the game are the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution V, Lancer Evolution VI T.M. Edition, Mazda RX-8, and the Nissan Skyline 25GT-T. The game features original Eurobeat songs from artists including Matt Land, Powerful T., Ace Warrior, and Marco Polo.

name: Magna Carta Portable
description:
This is a handheld port of the Playstation 2 game named Magna Carta: Tears of Blood. However unlike it's PS2 main version, this PSP port was only released in Japan.

Magna Carta: Tears of Blood is a Korean-made RPG in Japanese style, and a sequel to Phantom of Avalanche; it is set in the same world and has the same protagonist. The game's combat system is turn-based at core, but requires the player to press buttons in a rapid succession and with precise timing to execute attacks. The characters can store up energy to unleash a stronger attack later. Using the technique named Carta, they can also perform various special moves which are based on elemental affinities.

name: Joust
description: A port from the Arcade classic Joust.

name: Super Mario Bros. Special: 35th Anniversary Edition
description:
Super Mario Bros. Special is a follow-up to Super Mario Bros, originally released in Japan in 1986 for the home computer market. The game features 32 all new levels, 5 new enemies and 5 new power-ups. Due to limitations of the PC hardware, the game engine was quite poor in comparison to the Famicom/NES original. Most notable was the lack of scrolling; the PC version would instead show each screen one at a time.

This port brings the levels, new enemies and power-ups back to the Famicom/NES engine. Also included are most of the unique background changes and other features not possible with the original SMB engine. The end result is a much more playable game that feels like a legitimate sequel.

name: Slaypril Fools Day: The Video Game
description: SLaYpril Fools Day: The Video Game is a retro 1988 8-bit video game originally created for the ​Ante-Comp Pocket Play System.

name: Normal Me and Abnormal Friends
description: Having zero special skills, with just average academic performance, not standing out, with no friends… such normal me finally has friends… who are… from different tribes!?

name: Duelists of Eden
description: Build a deck and battle online in real-time action with rollback netcode!

name: Elancia
description: Sin descripción

name: Power Swing
description: In this game you have to push your rival down a cliff by hitting them with a ball.

name: Quake: Q25 Limits Jam
description: Q25 Limits Jam is a vanilla Quake collaborative jam made for Quake's 25th anniversary which reads; a great collection of maps made in the spirit of "Maximum DOS Performance". 16 small to large Old-School levels in varying classic themes, and a start hub map, all keeping within the original game's technical and stylistic restraints.

name: Princess Pyro
description: The sun is gone! Princess Pyro's searing fire powers are the only hope to revert the mysteriously sudden nightfall and fight back the encroaching forces of darkness. Jump, dash, and fireball across Pyro Castle in flashy retro-cade style!

name: Lucky Villager
description: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

name: Oil Invasion
description: You are super soldier whose mission is to find captured oil which is captured from evil army from East

name: Ambitious
description: "Ambitious" is a third person puzzle solving game based on the myth system written by Lovecraft. It tells the story of the demise of a fictional border town in Britain in the last century, as well as a deeper mystery.

name: Through the Kill Screen
description: Through the Kill Screen, an Adventure-RPG about 1980s kids discovering what slumbers beyond the final levels of their favourite computer games. Drink a Slushie, win a Thumb War and save Snoring Town from a sinister conspiracy.

name: Kingdom Hearts IV
description: The newest installment in the beloved RPG series was officially announced as part of the 20th Anniversary celebration of the Kingdom Hearts franchise.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Land of Warfare: Battle Maps
description: Land of Warfare is a skirmish map war strategy game. You will need to plan a strategy to build and defend your base from enemy attacks, collect resources to booster your regiment and then defeat your enemies by infiltrating their base. No missions, no unlocks, just load and play.

name: Brasfoot 2022
description:
Soccer manager and coach game.

Become a manager and command a soccer team, buy and sell players, choose the tactics and participate in the championships that simulate reality.

The game is super light, and several seasons can be played quickly and fun.

name: Legends of Kesmai
description: Legends of Kesmai (LOK) was among the first successful graphical multi-player online role-playing games. It was based on a slightly stripped down version of Island of Kesmai with 2D sprites replacing IoK's roguelike pseudo-graphics, and was available for play at America Online and GameStorm. Prior to that, Kesmai corporation ran a long open beta for the game, as well as hosting the game for a short period of time in the mid 1990s. In 1999 Electronic Arts bought Kesmai and in 2000 closed the business.

name: Kingdom Hearts: Missing-Link
description: Kingdom Hearts: Missing-Link is an original title for iOS and Android and is the first location-based action RPG set in the Kingdom Hearts series.

name: Otakle
description: A game inspired the popular web-based game Wordle where you need to guess the name of an anime or gaming character within 6 tries. Every try gives you new hints on who the mystery character is. A new puzzle is available every day at midnight. After you're done with the daily puzzle, you can share your score with friends and see who does better.

name: Project Acka Dimensions
description: Project Acka Dimensions is a TCG game that combines the world of video games with the new technologies offered by the Blockchain and the world of NFT's

name: Graduater
description: Precision platformer game, climbing up the mountain for graduation.

name: Moonstone Island
description:
Moonstone Island is a creature-collecting life-sim set in an open world with 100 islands to explore. Make friends, brew potions, collect Spirits, and test your strength in card-based encounters to complete your Alchemy training!

Spend a year away from home on an island in the sky! Following your village's tradition, you must move to an island in the sky to complete your Alchemy training. Armed with a team of nature spirits, magical potions, and the support of your new friends, you'll explore ancient temples, dangerous dungeons, and hostile biomes to uncover the dark secret of Moonstone Island.

name: Sunflower Land
description: Farm, Gather, Cook, Raise Animals, Fish, Craft & Trade your NFTs in this Web3 RPG based farming simulator

name: Supermarket Simulator
description: Take care of old and forgotten supermarkets and prepare them for the grand reopening. Repair and renovate everything inside and outside the store.

name: Memory Puzzle: Bad Girl
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young bad girl, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Cosmic Ascension
description: Arcade Action Roguelike set in a 2D Sci-Fi setting. Destroy countless enemies, fight bosses, discover artifacts, unlock new ships and upgrade your current ones.

name: Qember
description: 𝑯𝒆𝒚, 𝒄𝒖𝒕𝒆? Enjoy VR adult webtoons for 24hrs for free. If you have Oculus Quest, you can have more feel, you feel somthing X in Qember. Only adult, only you and us. Don't you curious about my hot stories with the women when I meet in VR? Come on and read it right away wearing your earbuds.

name: JellyMen
description: JellyMen is a chaotic split-screen party shooter where the goal is to be the last player standing to claim victory. Take advantage of a plethora of weapons to shoot, explode and pummel your enemies while avoiding the environmental hazards and destructible levels

name: Protect Ukraine
description: This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.

name: Raid on Taihoku
description: Raid On Taihoku is an adventure game with the backdrop of WW2 Taiwan. By controlling the characters avoiding the heavy bombardments from the sky, you will pass through different danger and safe zones. Through the game progress, you will experience the struggles of human nature and cruelty of war.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Easter 3
description: Holiday Jigsaw. Easter 3: 500 holiday photos will provide many memorable experiences this year!

name: Riddle of the Mask
description: Seek out the rarest masks for the countess! Become a real detective of the "Ancien Régime" and visit renowned carnivals to form a collection of unique masks.

name: Dank Subs
description: The combat is kind of like a Souls game and the gameplay is kind of like Fall Guys.You must find the level end first and avoid getting stun-locked and damaged by enemies! Gaming is back in a big way! That's right, daycare is open, and there is a new game for all the gaming frogs!

name: Man Without Organs
description: “Man Without organs” is a 2D detective adventure game. The player assumes control of “Man Without organs”, whose body is hollow inside, on his journey through a ruined Hong Kong.

name: Tobor Party
description: A local multiplayer racing game where you play as Tobors driving around the UTD campus!

name: TerraNova: Escape Room
description: You have been arrested for entering the house of a corrupt mayor, you are taken to the interrogation room, but nobody comes to ask you questions, hours pass and you are still waiting, you realize that inside the room there are puzzles that you can solve to get out out of the room and escape.

name: Summer In Memoria
description: A dark adventure game where you're tasked with "tagging" your classmates with a baseball bat. Unravel a bigger mystery as you explore bizarre locations and people.

name: Hentai Girls: Neko Pastry
description: An explicit Click-Through VISUAL NOVEL about Strawberry and Cupcage, two adorable Neko girls, working in a little pastry shop.

name: Cursed 2
description: Search a desolate town for traces of your childhood friend. A point&click adventure with action combat.

name: F.I.D.O.
description: Follow the very unique premise of an indie horror game about a demo-.... ok maybe not so unique, but we have a dog so there's that.

name: CatMxn: Chapter 1
description: A random guy is thrown into the role as a feline champion. Harnessing the primal power of cats, he must face terrifying trials with his new found powers. This leads him to hunting down cat killers on the dark web.

name: Supremacy: The Metaverse Game
description:
Supremacy is a collection of games that connect players into one immersive, interactive, and interconnected universe offering a unique experience to those looking for a Metaverse that blurs the line between the real world and the game world.

The Battle Arena is a revolutionary sustainable play to earn metaverse game, where AI-controlled NFT War Machines destroy each other in a 24/7 Battle Arena. Influence the battle in your syndicate's favor using $SUPS to win big rewards.

name: Fleabag vs. Mutt
description: A cat vs dog game where you have to throw different items at each other while being mindful of the wind direction.

name: Uchu Mega Fight
description: Uchu Mega Fight has three styles for each character. Choose a system that is close to your taste and the game you are familiar with .

name: Battle Pirates
description:
With your arsenal of pirate weapons and a head full of strategy, blast away those enemy pirates and purge the seven seas!
Create your own team and pit it against the CPU, or someone you just dont like.

name: Armor Heroes
description: Pick from the Ten Heroes, each with there own Special as they tackle wave after wave of enemies, and discover the best combos to do it with! This is by far my best game so far and I realy hope you agree, have fun playing it, if you do that, I've succeded! P.S. Some enemies attack from behind and others apear in waves, so unless "GO" flashes on your screen, theres killing to be had!

name: Sofia's Debt
description: Sofia's Debt is a point-and-click adventure game released in 2004.

name: Puzzle Freak
description: Roll the dice and land on a puzzle challenge. Complete it and advance to beat the other players/AI.

name: Four Second Frenzy
description: There are fifty mini games in this game. You have four seconds to complete each one use the arrow keys and the space bar.

name: The Fight for Glorton
description: A Smash Bros. style fighting game with fruits, vegetables and more!

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy's Candy Machine Deluxe
description: A flash game from Cartoon Network's main site for their popular show Ed Edd n' Eddy in which you create elaborate tubes to get a jawbreaker into a cup.

name: Quake: Sewer Jam
description: Sizeable community mapping pack with 11 sewer-themed levels and a start map based on the Extras mod with a few additions, among which are two new sewer-themed enemies. It also features custom skyboxes and a few music tracks

name: Upgrade Complete
description: A game in which the more you progress the more you upgrade EVERYTHING. Including menus, in-game audio, visuals, loading times, but also the gameplay itself.

name: Upgrade Complete 2
description: An upgrade to the previous game about upgrades. Upgraded in various upgradeable ways!

name: Quake: Alkaline Jam
description: Nine large, open industrial/base levels and a starting hub map. The underlying mod features a large number new and modified enemies, weapons and additional content like models, sounds, skyboxes and music tracks for each map. It is also meant to serve as a general toolbox for base-themed levels.

name: Forklore
description: You set out to begin a new life in Clementine. Reopen your grandmother's run-down place and transform it into a thriving business. Meet the locals and build meaningful relationships, explore everything the village has to offer for you!

name: Seeds of Unity
description: A unique story-driven farming RPG that also has aspects of sci-fi, romance, and exploration embedded within. Create lasting friendships, help the newly found colony thrive, investigate the unexplored surface, and perhaps even find that special someone along the way.

name: Hello Neighbor 2: Deluxe Edition
description: In this deluxe edition you get the game as well as three DLCs!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Swansong: Primogen Edition
description:
Based on the cult role-playing world and developed by specialists in the genre, Vampire: The Masquerade – Swansong is a narrative RPG in which your every choice determines the fate of the three main characters and of the Boston Camarilla.

The Primogen Edition includes:
- Victoria Ash DLC
- Artifacts Pack
- Digital Soundtrack

name: Porter
description: Porter is a small, simple action game.

name: Paper Snakes
description: Sin descripción

name: Barrel River 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Doughlings Bundle
description: Doughlings is a video game series developed as a tribute to the arcade classics that have become milestones in video game history.

name: Cotton Games' New Game Bundle
description: This bundle includes Cotton Games' latest Xbox game: Mr. Pumpkin 2 and Rain City.

name: Volley & Tennis Bundle Blast
description: Smash that ball and have a real blast enjoying the best sports!

name: My First Date RPG 2
description: In the "My First Date RPG" series, play as characters who experience a big part of growing up: going out on your first date!

name: Princess RPG
description: Two royal sisters are fighting each other for control of the kingdom?!

name: Motorcycle RPG
description: Mark is starting a motorcycle business, and his first team members are his girlfriend Sabrina and another friend. But new trials begin to appear for them. Will everything work out the way they want it to?

name: Deck of Ashes: Complete Edition
description: Roguelite Adventure With Tactical Card Combat

name: The 3D Machine
description: After an inventor makes a breakthrough, he leaves his incapable assistant alone with his new wonder invention, which leads to wealth, love...and catastrophe!

name: Barrage
description: Tired of "Pew-Pew"pistol,Why not try about Bofors 40mm Anti-Aircraft Guns,or Mighty 88mm Flak-cannon?Shatter the sky with your BARRAGE,and ther is nothing like aiming or reloading can distrub you from shooting.

name: Super Bullet Break
description: Super Bullet Break is a one-of-a-kind strategy deck builder filled with a wild bunch of cute and colourful characters - 'Bullets' - each and every one of them unique in their own way. Rescue online games from total destruction in a world where online multiplayer games have been taken over by a rogue AI! Can you save the world, defeat enemies in strategic turn-based battles, and beat Super Bullet Break?

name: Amnesia: Day One Edition Dual Pack
description:
In Amnesia: Memories, players will wake up as the mysterious Heroine, who has no memory of who she is. A friendly spirit named Orion will appear to help you regain your memories as you explore your world and remember those closest to you.

Amnesia: Memories Features:

Paths of Love - Select one of five guys as your love interest, each with multiple branching story paths. Each choice creates a distinct world where characters assume different roles, allowing for 20+ endings!
Show Your Affection - Parameters affect your relationship with your future love. Keep track of your relationship here and make sure you’re not headed to a bad ending!
Love of the Game - Play mini-games like Rock, Paper, Scissors and Air Hockey against other characters.
Love is Worth A Thousand Words - Unlock voiced images in the Gallery. Touching certain areas of the image will play dialogue of feelings that couldn’t be previously expressed.
A companion to Amnesia: Memories, Later x Crowd features a multitude of different story scenarios, as well as new mini-games. Deepen your relationship with the main characters and sub-characters of Amnesia: Memories and see what sparks!

Amnesia: Later x Crowd Features:

Amnesia: Later - Beginning with the enchanting storyline in NEW WORLD, you can unlock four different story scenarios, ranging from a study of the many sides of Waka in WAKA'S WORLD to AFTER STORY, which takes place after the events of Amnesia: Memories. Depending on the routes unlocked in AFTER STORY, you may even hear wedding bells.
Amnesia: Crowd - Enjoy even more story scenarios, like the thrilling what-if story of SUSPENSE, where you must interact with your environment to escape danger in each route. Plus, play a variety of café mini-games in WORKING or card games in TRUMP, earning Orion Points to unlock events.

name: Qix
description: Released on Game Boy in 1990, this version of QIX has not lost its appeal! QIX is an acclaimed arcade classic in which your goal is to capture areas of the playing field by drawing Stix (lines) with your marker.

name: West Water
description: West Water. Population? You. Loot, Run & Survive.

name: Extreme Speed Bundle: Go! Fish Go! Adrenaline Rush, Jet Ski Rush
description: Test your reflexes with three games that are all about speed! - Complete obstacle filled water courses in JetSki Rush!

name: Sharp Shooter Bundle: S.N.I.P.E.R Hunter Scope + Knights & Guns
description: Aim, breath, hold, squeeze - those fundamentals of marksmanship will come in handy! This bundle includes two arcade-style shooting games: - Become a hunter and fight for your freedom in S.N.I.P.E.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator: Pocket Edition 2
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator Pocket Edition 2 challenges players to repair, paint, tune and drive cars. Find classic, unique cars in the new Barn Find module and Junkyard module. Game also includes car auctions where old cars are available for resale or purchased for your collection!

Each mission offers its own unique challenge of varying difficulty and time constraints to meet. Additional tools are available for purchase if needed. You can eventually upgrade your garage to include specific equipment such as lacquer sprayer or a parts warehouse.

name: Chess Cartoons
description: A hilarious looking chess game! Play a game of chess with your friend or climb the ELO ladders in single player mode!

name: World Soccer Kid
description: A difficult but addictive soccer game!

name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting
description: In a universe where the earth has merged with another world, the hunt for a bride from another world has begun?!

name: Zombie Beyond Terror: FPS Survival
description: Survive or die in a world overrun by bloody Zombies!

name: Bridge Constructor Bundle
description: Bridge Constructor Portal + Portal Proficiency DLC Enter the Aperture Science Enrichment Center and experience Bridge Constructor Portal – the unique merging of the classic Portal and Bridge Constructor games.

name: Desktop Football
description: The desk is your field!

name: Half-Life: E7 Black Star
description: The story takes place in Russia at the secret plant called "Object E7" or "Black Star" at the same time as the unexpected consequences at Black Mesa. G-Man was planning to organize three incidents of portal opening originally. First one - at Black Mesa Complex. Second one - at Black Star plant. The third place is unfortunately unknown. But thanks to the fact that the cascade resonator at Black Star was out of order, the planned incident didn't take place there. Object E7 is a laboratory complex researching anomalous materials and organisms. Its academic adviser is Dr.Victor Shmurghe. He has connected directly with G-Man.

name: Half-Life: Edge of Darkness
description: A 2000 campaign mod for Half-Life with a brand new storyline for Half-Life.

name: Half-Life: Invasion
description: Invasion is a singleplayer modification of the famous game Half-Life. But a lot of innovations have been added. Among the most important new features, there are 44 maps, 12 new weapons (infrared gun, flame thrower etc), 2 new human enemies, a tank that you can drive, an entirely renewed protective suit and multiple subtitles.

name: Half-Life: Life's End
description: Life's End is a 35-map single-player Half-Life 1 episode following the (mis)adventures of Black Mesa scientist Luther Johnson during the Black Mesa disaster. Another side-story to Half-Life 1, but Luther's journey turns stranger than most.

name: Half-Life: Residual Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life: Residual Point
description: Sin descripción

name: The Trap
description: The Trap is a mod featuring: The atmosphere of Valve's Portal game, many incredible puzzles, an achievement system, a long time to the end, and the trap is for your brain.

name: Flintstones' Bedrock Boblseddin' Blowout
description: Race with the Flintstones in a cart across ice while collecting cereal.

name: Half-Life: Reissues
description: "Reissues" is a community compilation of 30 single-player Half-Life 1 levels authored by a mix of various designers.

name: Urban Trial Freestyle
description:
After reaching pole position in PlayStation Store Chart, the critically acclaimed Urban Trial Freestyle is now revving up for PC. The city is your playground! Nothing will stop you on your freestyle trials bike. Use the urban landscape to pull spectacular tricks - backflips, 360s, wallrides, ollies, and more. Customize your bike to boost your performance in Time Attack or Stunt mode. Choose between speed and style, developing your own unique riding style. Challenge the best riders in Ghost Mode. The variety and elaborate design of the different backdrops will keep you coming back for hours on end, to achieve a perfect run and knock the top riders off the leaderboard.

Urban Trial Freestyle has been greatly influenced by the support of Julien Dupont, the “godfather of urban trial freestyle.” Julien Dupont is known around the world for his unique street style and technique, mashing down barriers and setting new records.

name: Blastarock!
description: Sin descripción

name: One Last Memory: Reimagined
description: Re-discovers your own past and lost memories on this incredible journey through the nature while fighting your inner demons and fears.

name: Jewel Quest
description: Jewel Quest for Wii U brings the classic match-three puzzle game to life in stunning HD!

name: Alice in Wonderland
description: Discover unique and original characters in the amazing world of Wonderland.

name: Pinball Arcade
description:
Pinball Arcade by FarSight Studios features exact recreations of the all-time greatest pinball tables from Williams, Bally, Stern Pinball, and Gottlieb together in one game.

Every flipper, bumper, sound effect, and display pixel has been painstakingly emulated in astonishing detail.

name: In the Mood
description: Uncover beautiful ladies hidden under stacks of colorful balls in classic arcade-inspired puzzle action!

name: Game for Peace
description: Game for Peace is the official Chinese version of PUBG Mobile that offers the most intense multiplayer battles on your mobile phone. Join the battle, put on your gear, and play to win. Survive in epic 100-player battles in Classic Mode, Payload Mode, the fast-paced 4v4 Team Death-match Mode, and Infection Mode. Survival is all that matters. Survive to the end to get the last laugh. Accept missions and fire at will!

name: News Tower
description: News Tower is a news and resource management game. Your goal is to build a newspaper empire in 1930s New York that is profitable, independent, and – most importantly – wins the trust of its readers.

name: Nightly Maintenance
description: Nightly Maintenance is a psychological horror hidden object game. Play as Malcom, the maintenance worker, tasked with completing 3 tasks each night in a creepy, abandoned factory. Beware the watchful eyes of an oversized mannequin.

name: Half-Life: The Challenger Deep 2
description: This is a remake of the original Half-Life mod The Challenger Deep. This re-designed mod has been in development for more than 7 years. It follows the same storyline as the original.

name: Orqa FPV SkyDive
description: FPV Drone Racing And Freestyle Simulator.

name: Vantage Master Portable
description:
This PSP remake of Vantage Master features new characters from The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky, and multiplayer mode using the PSP's wireless capabilities.

Falcom announced the development of Vantage Master Portable for the PSP on December 20, 2007, which was released on the actual release data. Unlike the original Windows version, the interface is changed slightly for the PSP, meaning no PC mouse functionality. Otherwise, the game is essentially a complete 3D clone of the original Vantage Master with remastered orchestral music and corresponding gameplay mechanics.

name: Overshift
description: Overshift is a single player horror type puzzle game where you end up working too late at your office job and leave late after everyone else has. You quickly figure out that its not going to be as easy as you thought it was to leave.

name: Tilefinder
description: Tilefinder is an indie rogue-like turn-based grid RPG in which you slay hordes of monsters through a procedurally generated kingdom to find the legendary Tile shards! While excavating the castle, a floor tile came loose, releasing eldritch corruption that overtook the kingdom. Now, with the floor tile broken, it is your job to bring all the pieces together and assemble the Tile to seal the evil back where it came from!

name: Fruit Basket TV
description: Fruit Basket is the world's premier lethal obstacle course gameshow. Contestants run, jump, and dodge their way to a shot at one million credits, while the timer on their lives ticks down. Join the competition, shoot for the best times, and unlock the most fashionable of hats in order to stay alive.

name: A Potion For Chamomile
description: One day, Chamomile shows up to Lavender's house with a special potion recipe. She wants a transformation potion! Sadly she only has the recipe for a temporary one, so the two witches set out on a wild adventure to gather the ingredients for a permanent transformation potion!

name: Pokemon Breeder
description: A browser game made for YoYoGames in which you need to find the right combination of Pokemon to breed in order to spawn different types.

name: We Bare Bears: Bearsketball
description: The Bears are playing a street basketball tournament and need your help to win the trophy!

name: Rothdam!
description:
Dungeon crawler RPG inspired by Wizardry and the Shin Megami Tensei series, among others. The game was made on RPG Maker 2000 and released originally in 2011 by Engawa. The story is set in a world ravaged by darkness where four adventurers (fully customizable, name, race protrait and job included) are tasked by the goddess Zofie to venture into the labyrinth carved into the great tree in order to restore order to the mortal realm.

The game features challenging gameplay with a classic-feeling battle system, speel charges rather than MP, and some first persona, tile-based, good old dungeon exploration.

name: Merge Mansion
description: Merge Mansion is a mobile puzzle game where players renovate a mansion by merging various objects and solving match-3 puzzles. The game combines elements of interior design, storytelling, and puzzle-solving, with an ultimate goal to restore the mansion to its former glory while uncovering the mysteries of its past.

name: Dairantou Kanoair Smash 2002
description: A doujin fighting game using characters from visual novels Kanon and Air.

name: Mine Quest
description:
Orli, a dwarf miner, and Lumi, his fairy companion, discovered that the entire dwarven population had disappeared. Orli must embark on an epic journey and travel through the dwarven world to solve this mysterious disappearance.

Explore the underground of five ancient continents and search for artifacts that will help Orli uncover new clues about the fate of the missing dwarves. During this journey, mine blocks to collect resources and find blueprints to craft legendary weapons, armor, and gear. Subterranean monsters won't make this task even more difficult for Orli, so get ready to face deadly enemies in your path!

name: Cloudsea
description: Cloudsea is a low-poly exploration game set in the clouds of the world of Cloudsea. Explore the floating islands of Cloudsea in airships, manage crew, gather resources, solve quests, trade, and fight in airship-to-airship and melee combat!

name: The Dream Team
description: A fanmade game about Mr. Fruit and the Dream Team. A semi-linear turnbased RPG puzzle game where you play as Fruit, Rob, Blue, and Poppy to save reality from permanent sleep. Plenty of references, and a story deep enough to have things to spoil.

name: If My Heart Had Wings
description: Aoi Minase returns with shattered dreams to his wind-swept hometown of Kazegaura. There, atop a hill lined with wind turbines, he encounters a wheelchair-bound girl, Kotori Habane, and a beautiful, white glider soaring through the sky. Together, they decide to revive their school's defunct Soaring Club in order to ride the "Morning Glory", a phantom cloud carried on the wind that blows across Kazegaura. This is a tale of youth, a tale of boys and girls who loved the sky.

name: 星际神格
description: A turn-based story-adventure sci-fi role-playing game. It's not big, the player's operation is very simple, just watch the plot, operate the movement and quickly select it in the battle interface. There are some simple side differences, and the overall exploration is up to two hours.

name: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley
description: A story-rich first-person psychological horror game. You are in a lonely house, suffering from sleep paralysis. Deal with Thomas’ past trauma and make meaningful decisions that prevent you from going insane.

name: Battle of Heroes 3
description: The hero acts as a mercenary who is sent to the border of the kingdom. Use combat and magic skills, explore the fantasy world, develop a hero and warriors, towers, aura, magic, weapons. Explore and create magical items. Grow a dragon or a cerberus.

name: Soul Symphony
description: A Trippy Physics Based RPG. Make your way around a maze and try to figure out what is happening between different NPCs as they tell you things based on an Eastern Philisophy known as Ling.

name: Death Trading Card Game
description: Enter the vast world of The Death Trading Card Game where you can immerse yourself in a fantasy world where patience and strategy are your strongest tools.

name: Sprites at Play
description: Fast platforming, people hiding, others seeking. If you are the last one to be found you win!

name: Sailor's Stories Solitaire
description: Live the story alongside the characters! Classic solitaire in a maritime setting! Help friends in their search!

name: Old Future: Post-Apocalyptic Times
description: Post-apocalyptic, Sandbox, Crafting-survival Indie game. Explore at your own pace or team up with your friends in multiplayer. Early access game!

name: The Dragon Apprentice
description: Journey through dungeons and dangers – fight tooth n’ claw to your last flaming breath through 50 procedurally generated levels! Harness the power of Rune Magic to decimate your foes, and take to the air to evade enemies or launch devastating aerial attacks!

name: Another Path
description: A single-player puzzle exploration game sets in a desolated land in the mysterious world. Switch between a boy and a canine to explore this obscure island, and discover its mystical hidden artifacts. Solve the puzzle and escape the mysterious world!

name: Iai
description: This game is about IAI in Japan. (The creator is Japanese). Players are given a signal (!) Press the left click when the The winner is the one who can left-click faster than the enemy.

name: Shirazu Yama
description: First-person horror action game. Stranded on a mountain, you can only rely on your lighter to show you the way through the dark forest. Can you overcome your fear and find the way out?

name: Wacky Chariots
description: Take the reins and enter into the world of chariot racing inspired by ancient Rome with amusing twist. Victory and fame are waiting for you.

name: Whiskered Away
description:
Play as Gilbert or Skye and join them as they get whiskered away on a whole new adventure! Whiskered Away is a fun stress-free 2D platformer where you'll meet funny, quirky and interesting characters on your way.
A mysterious letter tasks Gilbert and Skye to head into the world, collecting as many (healthy) snacks and treats along the way. Make new friends while you make your way to Furball Meadows. Explore and find new areas and unlock new abilities to be able to progress further.

name: Medusa Frontier
description: A science fiction themed sandbox game with base building and elements of open world survival craft.

name: Hard Ball Wikie
description: HARD BALL WIKIE is a two-dimensional platform game. The game contains various dangers waiting for you.

name: Mad Murder's Mystery Pie Shop
description: FPS game involving finding ingredients and throwing them in the oven. Then bringing cooked pies to customers of Mad Murders Pie shop.

name: WarLords
description: Save the World by destroying it? Gather your squad and "put things in order"!

name: Ready Action
description: I'm keyboard, you're mouse! The actor has to jump over buildings, avoid obstacles, and film without a hitch But the cameraman shouldn't miss the actor Caution) do it with your friend, will fight your friend. do it alone, your left and right hand fight

name: TheBestiary
description: Risk and fight with vampiers and other creatures ,explore a medieval world and find hidden secrets .theBestiary is about survive and explore ruined Kingdom of Toprak ,upgrade your safe place and make quests in the chase after money and power .Be the best mercenary and find the lost book.

name: Bootstrap Island
description: As the sole survivor of a shipwreck in the 17th century, you must quickly learn to adapt and survive on a mysterious and ruthless island filled with deadly threats and secrets to explore.

name: TS Marketplace: Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01
description: The magic, the challenges, and the railroading drama of historic Marias Pass awaits you – with the Train Simulator Marias Pass Scenario Pack 01 from High Iron Simulations!

name: Heat Runner
description: Exciting, Cartoony, Floor is lava adventure.

name: Gowang: Clash on Demonhead
description: Gowang: Clash On Demonhead is an indie 1-8 Player 3D Party Fighter, featuring Rollback Netcode, Arcade Mode, Item Fusion, and Chaotic Mini Games.

name: Mortal Darkness
description: “One grim dawn and noble I wake, The darkness is rampant, our oath shall break. A noble warrior soon shall rise, and clear the air of the darkened skies.”

name: Port Imagination
description: Play as Pots Jr. in this short and disturbing slow-horror RPG. Explore the tropical town of Port Imagination while you wait for the ship to take you to Identity Island. Make new friends, avoid dire consequences, and learn to remain forever true!

name: Wish Talk
description: Set on a mysterious magical island, you will befriend toy characters through free-form chatting conversations powered by a cutting-edge deep learning AI. Help your new friends out, and guide them through their journey of growth and discovery!

name: Army Ops
description: Army Ops is a spiritual successor to classic America’s Army and a realistic, team and skill based tactical multiplayer FPS with focus on small unit tactical maneuvers. Teamwork, unique classes, a challenging progression system are the core pillars for community and competetive PvP matches.

name: LogiNode
description: LogiNode is set in a graph of nodes that are either blank or colorful, but most of them are hidden. Your job is to deduce whether the hidden nodes are blank or colorful, using the information they give you. If you like complicated Minesweeper-like games that do not require guessing, this is for you!

name: Hole in the Clouds
description: Leave the ground behind in this skill-testing game of airborne golf. Pop the clouds and beat the obstacles to sink your ball under par. Find out if you’ve got what it takes to beat all 54 holes of mind-bending challenges.

name: Small Phrases Great stories
description: Learning a language may be a challenge, happily here you practice playing, as fast you evolve faster you unlock new skills in-game and in life.

name: Matcho
description: Connect everything in this revolutionary Match-3 FPS with combat mechanics different from anything you've ever played before. Join Max and his friends on an epic journey as he takes on a mysterious alien invasion that could lead to curing his illness and saving the Earth.

name: Ecco: The Last Whisper
description: Ecco is a first-person psychological horror game where players won't survive if they don't pay attention to details. Players take the role of Valentina, a girl who is trying to follow clues regarding her family whereabouts.

name: Meet Cute: Delivery
description: Thanks for your order! The package will soon be delievered to you by our cutest delivery girl. Be gentle with her, and we might give you a discount for your next order!

name: Sex Adventures: The Spa
description: A visual novel about a young woman's naughty adventures at her favorite SPA.

name: 7 Angels
description: 7 Angels is an online chat simulator game, with visual novel style interactions, where each decision will change your fate forever on your road from a mere mortal to a sex god. Seduced and cursed by an evil Succubus, you need to fuck your way out of this damned spell and seduce all the 7 Angels of Sex.

name: There Won't be Light
description: Escape the terror lurking in the darkness in this immersive co-op experience. Solve challenges and work as a team using your main tool: your voice. Beware of lurking monsters, which might be the ones you least expect.

name: Presidents Fight
description: The fighting game that pits presidents from around the world against each other in hand-to-hand combat. The most fun way to resolve international conflicts.

name: Arms Doll
description: Arms Doll is a VR mecha action game where you become the pilot of a humanoid mobile weapon called an ARMS DOLL and fight against the enemy.

name: Enduring Dreamers: Freya
description: Side-scroller, platform game. A relaxing adventure until things begin to move too quickly! Save reindeers to unlock new gear. How far will you guide Freya?

name: Hellscape
description: Hellscape is a "Based-Text" Adventure game. Similar to Text-Based games from the 80's, with a lighthearted twist, and way more balls jokes than ever necessary.

name: Slashers
description: Slashers is a 1-4 player cooperative horror game, you are explorers of abandoned and seemingly cursed places, your goal is to see what happened there.

name: R'lyeh
description: A story-driven, open-world, Lovecraftian Horror and Survival game with a scifi twist.

name: Check it Out!
description: Ever dreamt of working a cash register with no pay or real-life customer interaction? Look no further! This simulation game brings a fresh-take to the notoriously dull tasks of customer service, introducing you to a cast of wacky characters and the baggage they carry.

name: Plunder Struck
description: Plunder Struck is a thrilling, high-stakes PvPvE looter shooter set during the Golden Age of Piracy. Recruit, arm, and train a fine pirate crew to raid the Spanish, British, Aztecs, enemy Pirates and more! Steal treasure, barter goods, craft weapons, go on quests. Your adventures will be legendary!

name: Project Kuragava
description: Project Kuragava is a visual kinetic novel with a thoughtful plot The protagonist Yuki enters Kuragawa Academy, he is the first guy in this academy. Will Yuki be able to change his past and future? Or will he lose this fateful battle?

name: 星之传说
description: Explore a strategy-type RPG, collect equipment, abilities, and upgrades in an open world. After capturing the five magic palaces. The causes of jihad and the rise and fall of civilizations in the Primordial Age can be identified.

name: Time's Crest
description: An evil being has stolen the king's daughter and is on their way to bring ruin to Nakimbo island, fight through dungeons and rescue the king's daughter, just make sure not to destroy the world whilst you're at it.

name: Cyphers Game
description: Break Bolshevik ciphers and destroy a Soviet armored train - take part in a great history.

name: Dogfight
description: Arcade shoot-’em-up action is back! Team up with the entire family for explosive action, signature humor and thrilling adventure. Join the Sausage Bomber Corps for daring missions to defend the nations of Relishtonia and more against the world-conquering ambitions from the mysterious Vega Nation.

name: Sex Adventures: Futanari BDSM
description: A click-through visual novel about a lesbian couple who goes to a secret BDSM club. They must be prepared for whatever the dominatrix tells them to do.

name: Operation Lovecraft: Fallen Doll
description: A roguelike strategy game featuring squad tactics and deck building, paired with a real-time sexually explicit third person sandbox supporting up to 10 players on the same map. Command glamorous investigators as they battle (and bed) cultists & eldritch horrors from Cthulhu mythos.

name: The Sargosian Abyss
description: Adventure awaits in this turn-based tactical roguelike! Explore the randomized depths of a massive dungeon, collect loot, and battle enemies in tactical turn-based combat as you guide your party of four adventurers through the abyss.

name: Swords & Bones 2
description: Swords and Bones 2 is an action-platform game with RPG features, inspired by 80s and 90s classics! Fight through levels filled with monsters, avoid traps and collect power-ups & trophies in this new epic second chapter!

name: Datascape
description: Traverse the Datascape, hack ICE to explore their programs and make a run on the SimulaCom corp! If that's not your thing just explore a section of the Datascape. A compact experience with a message to discover.

name: The Perished
description: A first person horror game where the player must use stealth and wits to escape the evil that faces them. This tense and story driven experience will leave the player terrified, but excited to explore the mysteries that surround them.

name: Silverblood
description: Years after leaving her family to join the Sisters of the Whiterock Coven, Edith is anxious to finally return home. But first she has to pass her Trial of Ascension, a harrowing task bestowed by her patron deity. Together, Edith and her bully must complete the trial, no matter the consequences.

name: Raconteur
description: Raconteur is a first-person exploration game. Alfred Poe is a imaginative writer that he uses his imagination to create virtual worlds to write his stories with his faithful friend, Daimon. Two friends didn't see each other for a long time, and Daimon is anger at him.

name: Vulnerable
description: Embody a displaced therapist in a futuristic refugee camp. Discover the life in the camp and share your everyday life alongside people with heavy pasts. Use logic and your therapeutic skills to solve mysteries threatening both your survival and the camp.

name: Plunge the Plumber
description: Is that a Plunger or a Robot? No! it's Plungster!!!!! The Hero we never knew we needed. He is the only one to save this impossible project and make the Community start to feel like Home. Who knew Plumbers were heroes?!

name: Moon Mystery
description: Moon's haunted. No really. Figure out what happened up there, unravel the moon’s mysteries, and uncover why we really raced to land on its surface in 1969. Fill up on oxygen, load up your guns, and set out on a celestial FPS investigation that starts on the Moon and leads across the universe.

name: Horror haze
description: Explore the world, learn magic spells, defeat enemies and solve tricky puzzles. All this awaits you in "Horror haze".

name: Nodyssey
description: A Dungeon Crawler RPG where you stay in your bedroom to defeat the Evil! Explore procedural generated dungeons, gain new abilities, build relationships and solve mysteries to overcome the dream realm! Enjoy your quiet life in town during the day, but prepare to face terrible Nightmares at night...

name: Night Racer
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Night Racer and reach the finish line before all your opponents.

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is an intense close ranged hack n slash focused on steel vs steel action in deep and deadly battles against nightmarish demons within a mysterious labyrinth that promises to lead triumphant warriors off their dying world.

name: Box Knight
description: A funny, silly and irreverent action RPG roguelike. A mix of ‘the Office’ and ‘Lord of the Rings’ with a comic like aesthetic.

name: Outrace
description: Outrace revives the pseudo-3D racing genre with a vibrant colour palette and synthwave soundtrack.Enjoy the iconic sights, sounds, tracks and cars of the arcade age.

name: Mauled
description: Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierces creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels. Survive on a earth fallen into oblivion.

name: Squirrels: Doomed City
description: Squirrels: doomed city is an exciting RPG set in the city of N, the main inhabitants of which are squirrels.. Explore the open world, go through the plot and unravel what secrets the doomed city holds

name: Kirameki School Life SP: The Wonder Years
description: Kirameki School Life SP: The Wonder Years is a romance visual novel developed by guyzware and published by Banpresto. It represents a certain game that appears in the original story of the Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai series and was only released in the limited edition of Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Portable.

name: Clown Café
description: Clown Café is a parody visual novel on Tumblr.

name: Clueless Fashion
description: Clueless Fashion is an unreleased video game made for the Nintendo DS, intended to be a tie-in for the 1995 comedy film Clueless. The game was developed by Glyphic Entertainment and was set to be published by 505 Games. The game was possibly intended to be released in Europe on February 26th, 2010, with no other planned releases being known (though the game is rated by the ESRB, meaning that a North American release was also likely intended).

name: Boyfiends
description: A selfish genius and a polite hero complain about their neighbor's taste in music in a car.

name: Torden
description: A stylized 3rd person action fantasy game. Slash your way with many but simple attack mechanics. Select from dozens of spells to help in your battle. Featuring a wide array of enemies with different quirks that need your quick reflexes and patience to deal with.

name: Delusions of a Lost Soul
description: Return to Lansinet castle to free your partner’s trapped soul. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and unravel the many paranormal mysteries that await you.

name: Ghosts of Hollow Creek
description: A fantasy story-rich turn-based RPG with customizable characters and romantic interest.

name: The Ghost Ship
description: Psychological horror game based on an old cursed ghost ship. Navigate the town of Hollow Point, and the accursed ship while trying to keep from going insane. Run, hide, and fight your way through the undead and save the town from a curse that has plagued Hollow Point for centuries.

name: Lost in the Space
description: Lost In The Space combines frantic top-down action with fast, fluid and very addictive gameplay, with instant response to player commands

name: Costume Clash
description: Costume Clash is a Halloween themed kart based action-adventure game set in a expansive world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of a Hallowmon.

name: Hell is Us
description: If war is the closest we get to hell on earth, it's because Earth harbours the worst of demons: humankind. In an isolated country ravaged by infighting, discover the secrets of your past and deal with the repercussions of a mysterious calamity.

name: Terror: Endless Night
description: Terror: Endless Night is a turn-based strategy game set in the XIX century. The game takes you aboard a rescue ship in search of HMS “Terror” and HMS “Erebus”, Royal Navy vessels on a mission to sail under the North Pole and reach East Asia. You were chosen to lead that expedition but let your son take your place and make a name for himself. Now he’s missing and you find yourself trapped in the middle of the Arctic Ocean, rid with immeasurable guilt.

name: Lone Planet
description: A sci-fi adventure with RPG with puzzle platform elements

name: Fell
description: Fell is a 2d Precision Platformer with a retro 1-bit aesthetic. Play through multiple unique areas, unlock new color palettes, and use fun movement abilities to conquer levels and make difficult jumps!

name: Dynacat
description: Save Dynacat's home from the incoming army of robots in this fast-paced 3D platforming adventure. Dash to the goal, find all the secrets, defeat enemies and earn points by doing it all in style!

name: Marble Ball Friends
description: This is an online cooperative Corinth-game like game that can be enjoyed by one or all, based on the theme of healing in nature. Cooperate with other players and aim for the jackpot.

name: Constructopia
description: Constructopia is a survival tower-defense game where you can design, build and craft your towers! Gather resources by hand or build systems aimed at automating your production! Build and maintain bases, design defense contraptions and use them to aid you in your adventure against the trolls!

name: Twin Edge
description: Twin Edge is a refreshing circular take on the Rhythm Game genre. Divide your attention evenly between two rotating circles and and try not to lose your rhythm!

name: Machinicide
description: Machinicide is a boomer shooter with imm sim and bullet hell elements. Reduce all evil robots to scraps with a huge arsenal of futuristic weapons and abilities, such as telekinesis, changing of gravity and many more.

name: This is Torture Together
description: This is Torture Together is an online co-op horror game for 1-4 players, following a structured campaign with randomized elements. Abducted by a sinister kidnapper, you now must escape his deranged facility, survive twisted abominations, solve puzzles, and reach one of several endings.

name: Paper Trails
description: It all started with a simple robbery. When that thread was pulled, a tapestry of mysteries were revealed. Solve cases and outsmart criminals in a detective story full of lies, confessions, and maybe even a murder or two.

name: Bombardier
description: Bombardier is a quick and chaotic online multiplayer game which supports up to 8 players in an arena, or play locally with up to 4 of your closest friends and battle to be crowned the ultimate Bombardier!

name: Twilight's Final Judgement
description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.

name: Tatari
description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

name: Bramblewood
description: Live in a Castle, Work for a Sorceress, Save the Valley! Bramblewood is a cute magical farming sim where you learn spells to care for plants. Befriend the locals and help them save their small businesses to unlock festivals and romance options.

name: Grand Theft Gato: Vice Kitty
description: Work for the Meowfia or work for the Purrlice, it’s your choice. Drive cars, scale buildings, steal, get into back-alley fights, or rob banks. Bring your friends to have a crew!

name: Roaming the Stars
description: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.

name: Tactics Adrift
description: A competitive turn-based tactics game with simultaneous planning.

name: Starchild Velta and loadtosky
description: Let's go on a journey of training! 2D side-scrolling action adventure of a cute star child!

name: Good Bones
description: Your new house has old secrets in this haunting point-and-click mystery, where you'll search for clues about a mysterious death, solve narrative puzzles, and make heartbreaking choices to navigate amnesia, grief, and revenge.

name: All Hail Temos
description: A first-person action RPG in a small hand-crafted open world. You are not a chosen one, but choose your own fate. Explore, fight, loot, trade, talk, quest, ride creatures, cast spells, or sneak and steal. Your actions can grow your starting village into a kingdom or bring it to ruin.

name: Immortal life of Confucius
description: A rpg game of history. Here, you can experience: free and open world, underground city exploration, solving puzzles, looking for legendary equipment, and playing with famous figures in history. Pixel image, story line driven by text.

name: Himbo Harem Homicide
description: A classic whodunit—but with a harem of himbos! Determine which of your hunky housemates is killing off the other handsome hardbodies before you’re left with not a handful of hotties, but just one murderous, monogamous man.

name: Slime Corp
description: Shoot things, get slime, upgrade your arsenal of weapons.

name: The Mansions of Shadows
description: First person game. Or you play Erwan, a young journalist. You are investigating a missing person.

name: Fantasy Battle Islands
description: Let's go on an adventure on our little island. We capture enemy islands and increase our island. We place different types of troops on the island and fight with a stronger enemy.

name: Gravix
description: Gravix is a challenging arcade game that will test your agility and puzzle-solving intuition. You must navigate an avatar that is continuously being affected by gravity that you control. Each level will introduce progressively challenging contraptions and deadly obstacles...

name: Krut: The Mythic Wings
description: Krut: The Mythic Wings is a fast-paced hack and slash, side-scrolling platformer based on a 2018 Thai CG animated feature-length film "Krut: The Himmaphan Warriors", following the adventure of a Garuda warrior on the enchanted Island, Himmaphan.

name: Retro Ride
description: Lean back, drift into the golden sunset - and let the rhythm take control.

name: Wildfox Surfing Paradise
description: Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island. By doing stunts for a surfing magazine you are able to earn money and buy new surfboards, which allow for even wilder stunts and open up new areas of the game's open world.

name: Destinesia
description: Destinesia is a sci-fi metroidvania which you are looking for a new home for humanity. Parkour your way through most dangerous jungles and explore the ancient dungeons. Upgrade your suit with the remains of your ancestors. Reveal the oldest secrets of Homo Sapiens.

name: Gerel: Against the Corvus Empire
description: A 2D Pixel Art Platformer with Metroidvania elements and a heartfelt story.

name: Kurama and the Cursed Isles
description: Kurama and The Cursed Isles is an adventure and Platformer Game. Explore 4 opened little area to unlock levels, resolve little quests and collect treasures. In the platformer levels, use the dash run to help you finish the levels which are based on the 4 themed seasons : Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter

name: Lands of Vodria
description: Climb the throne in this tactical game with clever maneuvers in card battles, as well as long-term strategy on the map.

name: Burial Stone
