description: A VR tile based dungeon crawl. Delve into a dark horrifying dungeon, with weird creatures and unexpected danger. Use spells, skills and weapons to traverse the dangers.

name: Crupt
description: Slash through swarms of enemies, fight bosses, and talk to wacky characters as you struggle to restore everything one Wave at a time.

name: Hell Punk Awakening
description: Hell Punk Awakening is an unconventional first person brawler where you progress beyond death. Destroy enemies in the most ludicrous fashion possible, and awaken the cosmic gods by wreaking pure chaos.

name: Alan-13 Reformation
description: An isometric puzzle game, that makes you think like a programmer.

name: The Night Walkers
description: This third-person game is inspired by the horror classics of the 90's. Intense and terrifying pace, survive the endless night and stay sane. Reveal through dramas and tragedies the hidden truth about the night walkers and figure out what lurks after death.

name: Shinogi Chess Club
description: At Yoshino High School, all that matters is your skill in Shinogi Chess. As the Spring Championships approach, Himiko Masaki investigates a dangerous organization and discovers a powerful ability. Climb the ranks, make new friends (and enemies), and search for answers in Shinogi Chess Club!

name: World of Haiku
description: Entering the World of Haiku is the first step to acquiring the critical, real-world skills needed to become a cybersecurity professional. In this first and only gamified cyberpunk experience, you gain real-world hacking skills as you advance through the game missions.

name: Greyhill Incident
description: Greyhill Incident is a Survival-Horror game about classic Grey-Alien and UFO abductions. Survive the invasion of your neighborhood, investigate the outlying village, seek for helpful utilities to protect your neighbors, and hide from "The Greys."

name: Drones: Defenders Astartes
description: A 2D, top-down shoot'em up with simulation elements, embedded in retro tech from the '80s. Blast your way trough space and enemies. Upgrade your space drones. Endure your mothership's AI cynical attitude and enjoy the most realistic shoot'em up ever!

name: Technitive
description: Technitive is a first-person open world tower defense set in 2043, where you advance from primitive tools to machines and modern weapons. A colonization attempt is set on an Earth-like planet after an extinction threat to the current planet. Colonize the planet and save the world!

name: The Silent Swan
description: The Silent Swan is a first-person open world narrative experience across a monolithic, derelict world. Mixing both the walking simulator and open world genres together, the game brings the meaning of openness to urban areas for the first time to this scale.

name: The Safe Place
description: This is a dramatic deep social point&click adventure about tough childhood and self-sacrifice.

name: Froggy Quest
description: Help Froggy complete a quest in this colorful platformer adventure! Use your sticky tongue to pull, push, and grapple through many challenging levels while collecting as many flies as you can.

name: A Good Truck Driver
description: Do you trust your own driving skills? Here a truck simulator that you can show your skills with various obstacles and parkours!

name: Garenburg Penitence: The Riflebird
description: Garenburg Penitence is an action-puzzle arcade game about matching sphere colors and exploring the collapsing psyche that destroyed the world. With over 70 unique level maps, additional game modes, and a level editor, learn the story of a fragile girl and her regretful actions.

name: Home VR
description: Home is a thrilling VR stealth game following the story of a little girl trying to escape monsters in her boarding school. Think Alien: Isolation but it's VR, you're a little girl with no weapons and you can hide within walls and objects.

name: L.A.P.D. 2195
description: A modern re-imagining of the classic game "Future Cop L.A.P.D.”, you are a rookie cop in the Advanced Weapons and Tactics Unit of the Los Angeles Police Department in the year 2195.

name: Farmer Toon
description: In Farmer Toon, you play a farmer who inherits a farm. You can harvest crops, raise animals and cook food. Trade with other players online to get richer ! Choose your specialty from 3 professions. Relax in the city centre with your friends online !

name: Pokaban
description: Push cards strategically into marked positions to create a poker hand. Beat the dealer's hand to win. Sokoban with poker mechanics.

name: Glob
description: An online fast-paced multiplayer party experience! Master the stretchy power of Glob to sling around the world and throw objects at your enemies! Compete in many competitive game modes or work with friends to solve puzzles and sling through the world together. Did we mention there are lasers?!

name: Wavecade
description: Wavecade is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.

name: The Instruments of Faith: Padua's Destiny
description: The Instruments Of Faith Padua's Destiny is an epic apocalyptic 2D pixel Metroidvania fantasy action-adventure video game. Journey through the Universe as Young Padua, one of the 7 Guardian protectors of the Universe, to restore the balance of Good over Evil before it is too late!

name: Turro 2022
description: Just finish the race and be winner!

name: Boneraiser Minions
description: Amass an army of deamonic undead to fight endless waves of heroes intent to end your boneraising ways! In this gothic-horror auto-battle roguelite, use the bones of slain heroes to raise your minions, collect powerful relics and spells, and unlock meta upgrades, all to survive King Gigald's crusade!

name: Prayer of the Faithless
description:
Prayer of the Faithless is a unique blend of traditional RPG and classic survival-horror gameplay. In addition to fighting enemies to level up, you must also scavenge the field to find healing supplies, as well as new gear that comes with their own skills and traits to further customize your party. Battles reward smart tactics and aggressive offense by tying stamina pools to both skill usage and damage reduction. Enemies are challenging, but an understanding of the options each character has available to them will take you farther than grinding levels will.

Each ally's personality traits affect their combat prowess and abilities. As the story goes on and the stakes are raised, these traits will develop (and degrade!) along with the character's mental state. You will get to truly understand how each character thinks and feels through conversations and battle performance, and see how the state of the world affects their morale and beliefs.

name: The Darkest Star
description: Fight for survival by gathering a fleet of powerful space warships in a turn based rogue-like, Decisions are key as the battle evolves over multiple turns. Use a multitude of weapon systems and ship types to press home the attack with a unique turn based system.

name: Loopback
description: Loopback is an arcade-style scrolling shooter game where you will battle through waves of enemies, fight unique bosses, and build new weapons as you make your way back home.

name: Camae
description: Help Camae get his colors back in this action puzzle adventure game. Fight to earn experience to improve your skills and solve a lots of hidden puzzles to get items that will help you on your adventure

name: Vantageous
description: Vantageous is a highly competetive board game, where you have to strategize your piece placement, stack your pieces to increase their range and outsmart your opponent. You can play on the same device, online or against the computer! Play against your friends or challenge the rank ladder!

name: Floppy Cat Adventures
description: Explore a fun and dangerous open world in this darkly comedic soulslike RPG! Talk your way out of (or into) problems, battle monsters, befriend or betray the villagers, learn magic, collect tools and weapons, oh yeah - and find out how you got turned into a cat!

name: Pillars of Light
description: Pillars of light is a first person action / puzzle game where you will have to continue what your family have done since the beginning of times : protect the world from shadows and make friend with Utu, the light god.

name: Inga Ouhou: Murderous Plaza
description: This is a game about the 12 Star Signs x Blood Thirsty Killers x Communal Life.

name: FireSquad
description: FireSquad is a real-time strategy game in which you are controlling a group of 4 firefighters. You will need to manage the fire spread, break through doors and windows, search for survivors and rescue them to safety before the fire becomes unmanageable and the building collapses.

name: Escape Purgatory
description: Set in a limbo realm, this strategic horror game, charges the player with traversing the world while solving puzzles and challenges. With each discovery, collect items, repent your sins, and be freed from evil. Can you survive the wickedness within?

name: Yokai Hunter Shintaro
description: Yokai Hunter Shintaro presents the adventures of two heroes on a quest to restore balance between the human world and the Yokai kingdom. It will be your mission to kill the different bosses of each stage to restore order.

name: Wicked Dolls
description: Wicked Dolls is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game. Investigate hidden clues to find out how to imprison the possessing spirit of the dolls that lurk in the shadows. With a macabre ritual, eliminate the imminent evil, which is not always what you imagine. Are you prepared?

name: Strawberry Samurai
description: Strawberry Samurai is a samurai-themed action platformer with a fruity twist. Slash oranges, blueberries, and more in a world filled with bloody combat, sentient fruit, and an obnoxious amount of fruit puns. Oh, and bathe in the juice of your enemies.

name: Let There Be Light
description: Let There Be Light is a puzzle platformer developed by Jack Edwards. Using the complex nature of light and its many forms, you will navigate your way through the capitalism-based afterlife that awaits all living beings after their demise - with some help from a very stressed employee, of course.

name: Being a Penguin
description: Being a Penguin is a short and emotional exploration adventure game about wanting to become someone else. Play as penguin Bree as she finds herself as she completes quests from various animals and explores a beautiful frozen world!

name: Sir Magical Jelly
description: An action-adventure journey of a small slimy creature that has fast mobility. Focused on monster elimination with metroidvania elements.

name: Jean's Boutique
description: Run your own Jean's Boutique, a great fashion game combined with the fun of serving customers. To make it in the fast-paced world of fashion, Jean will need to be fast on her feet, dedicated to her customers, wise in her upgrades. For fast fashion fun, there's no place like Jean's Boutique!

name: Maze the Quest
description:
Maze The Quest is a small adventure action roguelike. Helps your hero in search key and the exit of each maze. Endless mazes and various sizes.
Various monsters, traps, spells and attributes in the purest style of RPG.
Many weapons, shields, accessories and items with which you can equip your hero.

name: Iron Frost
description:
You are Iron Fröst and you must to activate all the bombs and reach up the next level avoiding guards who try to catch you.
You can freeze blocks into floor near your location to temporarily trap guards and may safety walk atop them.

name: Lukia
description: A hardcore RTS game focusing on Macro-management and designed for touch screen!

name: Doodle City
description:
By drawing a network of roads on their play sheet, players are building a city, trying to score points for their hotels, shops and taxis - all while avoiding pollution.
Working out an ideal road network can be quite the puzzle, and before the game begins, roads through parks are randomized, making sure no two games will be alike.

name: Lost in the Pages
description: Travel through different books in a quest to find your uncle! You will travel through a number of stories, seek to understand why they are falling apart, and trying to solve the mystery of your uncle's bookshop.

name: Nil Action Metronome
description: Take the rhythm and get out of the death loop.

name: Tokyo Debunker
description: A dark fantasy otome game for iOS and Android.

name: Afterlife
description: Afterlife is a challenging side-scrolling adventure game. Filled with tight platformer mechanics and obstacles, you must unravel the mysteries of this strange land by finding clues, solving puzzles, and dying, over and over again.

name: Apollo: A Co-Op Game
description: One astronaut. Up to four mission commanders. Work together to plan your mission and experience the historic highlights of the Apollo space program.

name: Artis Impact
description: Artis Impact is a story-rich, adventure pixel RPG that features classic turn-based combat, upgrading your home, and exploring uniquely hand-drawn environments. Players will take on the role of official Akane, teaming up with Bot to unravel the mysteries of a future utopian world.

name: Oh, Brave New “Red” World!
description: This is the game in the genre of Vertical Shoot’Em Up. Using only your mouse, you will lead one of the “Stalin` falcons” and take part in the Liberation Campaign of the Red Army in the far distant future.

name: Patient
description: You are a patient of a psychiatric clinic. You don't remember anything about your past. A certain orderly helped you escape, because he knew that you were here by mistake. You need to find out the real reason of it.

name: Horse and Go Seek
description: Get ready to gallop through scenic locations with your majestic horse to find all the hidden animals! Travel through a variety of different landscapes to unlock horses, hair colors, levels, spirits and worlds.

name: Beat Stickman: Beyond
description: A well-crafted narrative-driven idle clicker game with stunning and chaotic graphics. Nebody will be your friend on the journey to provide help and stories.

name: Covid 69
description: The Year is 2069, covid is worse than ever. Antimaskers just kidnapped your girl. Now there are hordes of zombies between you and your girlfriend.

name: Far Star
description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

name: ConquestAreas
description: Capture flags to earn points. The first team to reach 300 points wins!

name: Exocide
description: Exocide is a retro FPS with an early 00's aesthetic. Manage two powerful sets of weapon systems with extreme aggression to annihilate the swarm! Keep your maniacal robotic backpack excited using a powerful array of weaponry.

name: SIM Chef: Restaurant management
description: SIM Chef is a restaurant management simulator. Build and decorate, manage employees, create hundreds of classic dishes and drinks, make decisions and become the number one in the world.

name: The Sword of Rhivenia
description: Are you worthy of the throne? Or do your siblings deserve it more than you do? What kind of heir will you be?

name: The Four Elements: Zombies
description: A Single player/ Co-op zombies shooter game, with a twist! There are many types of enemies and you utilize a list of abilities based on the four elements to defeat them. Along with many challenges and puzzles to solve, you progress to explore and discover the Four Elements: Zombies universe.

name: A Crown of Sorcery and Steel
description: Swing a sword, delve dungeons, and lead a resistance against the tyrannical queen of a war-torn fantasy realm. Will you unite the realm and end the queen’s reign of terror... or join her and rule by her side?

name: Underground Lords
description: Purge the underworld from the demons!. Underground Lords are hardcore action rogue-like dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. Chose one from the 3 characters, gather equipment, and mow the lords that rules the underground!

name: Falling to Heaven
description: Falling to Heaven is a rogue-like, action, twin-stick shooter. Players will play as a veteran mercenary who has experienced many battles, guided by a mysterious voice, to fight a way out from the bottom of hell, and learn about the truth of his falling.

name: With Good Intentions
description: The Age of Blade and the Age of Gun entwined. The master of the knights and the imperial captain are separated by centuries, but bound by memory. Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.
Discover who you really are on an adventure where choices matter and accuracy is paramount.

name: Star Jet Alpha
description: Star Jet Alpha is a top-down 3D space shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Progress through each stage by blowing up enemy space stations while avoiding or destroying enemy missiles, space mines and asteroids. Unlock Star Jet capabilities by completing stages.

name: The Endless Summer Surfing Challenge
description: A realistic physics based surfing simulation. Complete the 12 challenge rounds with a choice of 5 different surfers or a body boarder. Compete in two player timed and scored contests with two players surfing at the same time.

name: Slap-It Together!
description: Set in a game show that only cares for the numbers; you and up to 3 online friends slap, throw and whack your way through hordes of enemies and hand-painted environments in this comedic zombie wave-based fighter.

name: Cradlemoor
description: Cradlemoor is an interactive mystery game, which casts you as the detective, inviting you to explore a labyrinth of documents, photos, videos and audio clips via a virtual desktop computer. In Cradlemoor, you are the detective.

name: Paradox Factor
description: Paradox Factor is a 30,000 word interactive science-fiction novel by Mike Walter where your choices determine how the story proceeds.

name: Sirenhead: Southpoint
description: Sirenhead: Southpoint, a Survival Horror game that takes place in the 1980's as you, Freddy Anderson try to go camping with your friends when all of a sudden, things go south. Your friends are no where to be seen, you are all alone. Except there is one creature waiting for you in the woods.

name: Stardander School for Witches
description: Welcome to witch school! Learn spells, solve mysteries, make friends, and battle (or befriend) Fae creatures in a turn based battle system. Will you become the witch who defeats the malicious enemy who has laid siege to the world?

name: Squirrels are going nuts
description: A grid based action blast em up with single player and local multiplayer party mode for 1-4 players.

name: My Gaming Club
description: In the game My Gaming Club you can feel exactly what it's like to own a gaming club, because realism is one of the main features of the game. Assemble PC, buy furniture, food for your club and for your visitors. This game is not just a gaming club simulator, this game is a real life simulator

name: Claim your Free BitBuddy Today!
description: "BitBuddy" is a virtual pet raising game. When you quit, your BitBuddy will die.

name: Fever Dream
description: Fever Dream: Escape the nightmare 'Ignatius' has trapped your soul in. Survival is key. You aren't alone in the dream, but only you have the power to escape!

name: Whisper Out of Time
description: Whisper Out of Time is many things: Role playing game with a focus on the Role, life simulator in a unique setting, and a fun journey with a, hopefully, even more unique story.

name: One Btn Bosses
description: It's One Button Bosses, it's all in the name. You have one button. There are big bosses to beat. Push, tap, and bash in the handcrafted campaign or in the roguelike rifts.

name: Realms of Survival
description: Realms of Survival is a Single Player / Online Multiplayer Action RPG, with a Multi-Class Character System, giving players a great variety of playstyles and customization. Fight against monsters, bosses, or other players in various open-world maps and battle scenarios.

name: Elegos
description: Want to overthrow the sovereignty or work to stand with them? Decide for yourself in Elegos, an immersive first-person RPG where every action matters. Designed with a flexible play system, forge a path through a world where complex political forces clash in any way you like.

name: Dice Kingdoms
description: Dice Kingdoms is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game where resource collection is based on dice. Build efficiently to quickly expand your kingdom. Roll dice to gather resources while risking natural disasters. Accumulate army and/or culture to achieve victory!

name: Satan's Puzzle 2
description: A continuation of Satan's Puzzle 666 game, this is a puzzle game where you have to match magic circles pieces and get an evil spirit

name: Ellisar
description: Dive into this magical underwater adventure. Explore a corrupted environment moving with your two transformations to help fix the disaster that almost ended life around your world. Ellisar is a third person contemplative exploration and adventure game.

name: Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato
description: Emotional narrative adventure about the things we pass along. Inspired by Miyazaki, Coco, and The Little Prince.

name: Matchcraft: Efir Adventure
description: Welcome to Matchcraft: Efir Adventure, a unique hybrid of item crafting sim and match3 mechanic with RPG elements.

name: Yin Yang Space
description: A sandbox FPS game, you can build gardens in the most intuitive and simple way and play with robots.

name: Pingo's Revenge
description: With logical moves you'll be able to push all the diamonds together and thus master the levels. Make your own way through the different areas and kill the enemies with the help of ice blocks to save your girlfriend.

name: Cornucopia
description: Cornucopia is an enchanting 2.5D pixel art farm sim RPG. Transform your farm with the innovative NPK soil system, nurture delightful animals, and enjoy captivating gameplay. Befriend vibrant villagers, uncover mysteries, and shape your adventure. Don’t wait—start your magical journey now!

name: I Wani Hug that Gator!
description: I Wani Hug that Gator! Is a choice-driven narrative about teenagers struggling to find their way. Help Inco, loser highschooler extraordinaire, navigate his budding friendships (and romance!) while surviving being the only human in a dinosaur-filled school.

name: Lionel the Dragon
description: A dark and Moody 2.5d, story-driven action puzzle game based on a child with a worrying view of the world.

name: Guardian Mage VR
description: Feel like a battle mage, able to embody powerful spells and bring them down on opponents from the air! Control the course of the battle with the help of rune magic, summon your troops and erect defensive structures. This world is in your hands!

name: The House of Da Vinci 3
description: Walk in the shoes of an apprentice and friend of Leonardo da Vinci. Find hidden mysteries, solve handcrafted mechanical puzzles and travel through time and space to lead the story to its grand finale.

name: Sentry City
description: Sentry City is a cyberpunk-style side-scroller with gameplay that is part trial-and-error, and part reaction time based. Traverse the city using the motorcycle overworld map, blast and think your way through the levels, and fight tough bosses to uncover who is behind the city's AI disruption.

name: Abomiracers
description: Abomiracers is a multiplayer party action game, where you assemble your character from different body parts made of clay and fight to become the King of the Hill!

name: I Am Mouse
description: I Am Mouse is a game in which the player takes the role of a mouse, which must find food for the family. Hide, run, distract and knock down. Do your best to get food for your family!

name: The Bunny Graveyard
description: An episodic puzzle adventure about a bunny who seeks to find the horrifying truth behind her existence.

name: Blackout!!
description: Blackout!! is a Tower Defence Action-RPG where you must defend the land of Suwemba from the evil Olrinds! Select one of two heroes to fight back wave after wave of enemies by summoning defences while participating in the action-packed combat!

name: Proto Akane
description: Akane pilots a vehicle that transforms to have different abilities to advance and defeat her enemies.

name: Crabs: Chef's Story
description: In this Multiplayer Party Brawler, play as one of 'Chef's' crabs! Launch crab ass with 'Crab-fu' and battle online in a number of crazy game modes designed to push your crabs abilities to the limit.

name: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy
description: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy is a branching visual novel that follows the adventures of a certain plague doctor. What secrets do the Ailur people hold, and who St. Elmo really was? Venture into the heart of the frozen Taiga and find the answers.

name: Disaster Island
description: Disaster Island is a unique survival based game, where you have to accomplish missions on abandoned island. But It's not gonna be easy, its not ordinary island. You will be confronted by natural disasters and numerous hidden dangers.

name: Auto Cast
description: Auto Cast combines elements from action rouge-lites, RPGs, and Shoot 'Em Ups into a 2D top-down world. Unlock new spells, level up existing ones, equip unique items, and find special events to maximize your chances of survival while cutting through hordes of enemies and bosses.

name: Dungeon Dueler
description: Hack and slash game. Visit blacksmith and create your own equipment. Also remeber about herbalist and make some potions. When you are ready conquer creatures from dungeon.

name: Diamond Hands Arena
description: DHA is a tactical fantasy gladiator game. Recruit a team, train, buy new weapons for heavy arena fights against other teams. Use all you can to win: gossip about opponents, get quests rewards, use powerful magic and pray not to die! The tournament rules are simple: it's harder and harder each time!

name: Sea of Choices
description: With both immersive and life sim elements, plot out your day to day life in the shoes of Aura! In combat use turn-based tactics to employ a strategy that leads to victory! Or just chill out and collect records and read books!

name: The Dreadful Space
description: A very action space war game, the mission is to fight the ships from other planets, the game requires a lot of skill to get rid of enemy shots and counterattack with all the cool features you can get in the game. The combat is intense and very agile, confronting your skills as a Battleship player.

name: Elemental Land
description: Elemental Land is a free-to-play MMORPG where you can explore the world however you want, facing monsters and players. Monsters, Spells, Craft, PvE, PvP, Guilds and many more.

name: Billy Saves the World
description: Run, slide, and Rocket Boost through a scifi-vania platformer, or explore, solve puzzles, and talk to the wacky locals to progress through this comedic love story about becoming a better half, for your other half.

name: BlockStar VR
description: BlockStar is a VR shooter where you put your reflexes to the test shooting cubes and completing challenges in an action-packed futuristic tournament. Play the 40-mission story mode and show that you have what it takes to become a filthy-rich champion.

name: Revenge of the Killer Octopus
description: Revenge of the Killer Octopus is a third-octopus game where you shoot and possess your way through throes of enraged scientists in order to take your revenge!

name: The Beresford family
description: On the night of July 20, 1824, eight-year-old Matilda Beresford was found dead. What happened that night? Was little Matilda's death an accident? Discover the origin of the curse.

name: The Jelly Adventure
description: The Jelly Adventure is a puzzle-casual game peefect for kids or even for those who had a more stressful day.

name: You Will Die a Lot Buddy, Trust Me!
description: A challenging platformer where you have to overcome obstacles. Avoid rays and spikes using the grappling gun. There are checkpoints for each room, so don't be afraid to die. And finally see your rank on the leaderboard at the end of game.

name: Unaware
description: Gather your strength and find information about your whereabouts. Explore the area. Find and assemble all the puzzle pieces. This way you will learn about the dark past.

name: Oust
description: Oust blends strategy, rpg, and pvp elements neatly into a beautiful, easy-to-pick-up game. Begin the game as a peasant, customize your profession and fighting style, find equipment and gather support to overthrow the king. As king, manage the kingdom to remain in power as long as you can.

name: Unhappy Hour
description: unHappy Hour! is a too accurate life-sim featuring bartender action, lousy work-life balance, and not-so-sarcastic humour. Pour beers, pay your bills, and overcome precariousness in this pixelated drama.

name: Premortal VR
description: Premortal VR is a medieval VR-only game. Explore and survive the procedurally-generated wilderness. Gather resources and craft gear. Build formidable bases. Overcome all boss trials to ascend!

name: Project Mind
description: RAID other spaceships, EXPAND your fleet and EXPLORE space in order to discover the aldions´ real intention...

name: Murder Is Game Over
description: Murder Is Game Over is a pixel art point-and-click murder mystery involving the untimely death of a famous game designer. You and your trusty companion are on the case!

name: Nyaaaanvy
description: Physics sumo-wrestling game! A heated battle for dignity among mysterious cat-like creatures. Nyanvy who wins the battle can be a true cat!! Could it be...?

name: The Mensional
description: Adventures of different characters with their unique atmosphere and puzzles.

name: Railroader
description: You and your fellow railroaders are the lifeblood of your railroad, just like it is the lifeblood of the communities it serves. Switch cars at industries. Keep people moving while running local passenger trains. Run trains with a purpose in transition era Appalachia – in Railroader!

name: Arsenal Shock
description: Arsenal Shock is a fast-paced singleplayer arena dual-weapon shooter. Use a multitude of weapons to fight off endless waves of enemies and achieve new high scores in 11 diverse mayhem-filled arenas. Also includes two Playground levels with gravity gun functionality.

name: Only Lead Can Stop Them
description: Only Lead Can Stop Them is a retro FPS set in the Spanish Civil War. Fight the Fascist Hordes!

name: Castan
description: Explore an open post-apocalyptic city, delving into buildings and businesses where mutated creatures run rampant, few survivors still operate in reclaimed buildings. Working to pay the mafia will be no easy task, as diving into the dangerous contaminated World to make a profit is a death sentence.

name: Not Spooky: But Good Enough For Me
description: In this first-person horror-lite game, investigate your way through different locales such as the theatre, forests, and urban areas. Solve puzzles and unravel the story behind what happened at the community theatre.

name: Spiriat
description: Fly at high speed! Avoid and escape from the dark to find out. Collect light as much as possible, before you meet with the masters, who will guide you to your destiny.

name: 2 Bit Operative
description: As a government operative tasked with handling the most dangerous tasks, you must Shoot, Spy, Sneak, Sear and Sabotage your way to success. Each mission has unique objectives. Can you complete them all?

name: Light the Lamp Hockey
description: Old School Hockey Gaming in a Beer League coat of paint! Welcome to the most dynamic 8-ish bit hockey experience you could have ever asked for. Built on simplicity and full of depth, Take your team to the playoffs and win the almighty 'Ship!

name: DeepStorm Online
description: Deep-Storm Online the Action and Exploration MMO underwater game! Dive into this world of alien flora & fauna, Explore caves, Beat Bosses, And build your very own class & ship from a huge tech tree featuring over a thousand Nodes & Upgrades!

name: Bumaga
description: This walker from 3 persons, the world of which is made of paper. the mechanics here are simple, you can run, jump and create platforms in the indicated places. According to the plot of the game, you need to collect 3 items with which to defeat the enemy in order to return your house and otherplaces.

name: Critias Empire
description: Turn-based strategy game with 4x elements. Build your empire while surviving frequent disasters rained down by the ancient Gods.

name: Octo Vinctum: Saga of the Galactic Stardom War
description: A JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid designed like the legendary RPGs of yesteryear! Vanquish the toughest foes using the power of kind words and musical talent! Uncover the dark and supernatural secrets that lurk beneath a cheery and cutesy world! "Prove the justice of our culture!"

name: Bearcycle
description: bearcycle combines fast-paced motorcycle racing with wacky platforming madness. Grind, grapple, and rocket your way through the forest, local city, and beyond! So grab some berries, catch some air, and land a trick in this unBEARably fun classic.

name: Rightfully, Beary Arms
description: Rightfully, Beary Arms is a bullet hell roguelite that is about more than collecting loot, dying, and then losing everything. Carefully choose enemy upgrades against your own. Plan your dungeon crawl tactfully to gun through unique factions of enemies and strategically preserve loot after death.

name: News Reacts
description: Suddenly one ordinary morning you are accused of terrorism! You are hunted by authorities, special forces, panic-stricken citizens and the news media. In a modern city you are always in the wrong place at the wrong time equipped only with your brain but with NO weaponry.

name: Mayu: Last of the Yaksha
description: An exploration-driven adventure RPG set in Ancient India about a young demi-god and his animal sidekicks. Use your jungle detective skills to discover hidden paths, track down mysterious creatures, and find the secret temples of the Old Gods.

name: Orbisia
description: Orbisia is an open-world survival crafting game. You have to work with your team members to explore and survive the wide and beautiful world. Enjoy a free world by gathering and hunting for survival!

name: World of Busking
description: World of Busking is an independently developed, MMO Social Game. Meet other players, interact with AI characters, play music, form bands, attend concerts and try to release your singles to become the #1 songwriter in Music City.

name: Undying Lantern
description: Undying Lantern is a third-person action game where your goal is to subdue otherworldly criminals who are on the run. Locate them by exploring mysterious locations and overcome their challenges by mastering the lantern's powers and understanding their weaknesses.

name: The Deep Diving of FloodDragon
description: "Landing on the moon and diving into the deep sea" is a human dream. In this game, you will experience this great journey. Understand the structure of Jiaolong, drive the submarine with the deepest diving depth in the world to dive into the deep sea and explore unknown places.

name: Curtain Call
description: "Curtain Call" is a visual novel about (literally) breaking through social masks by forming meaningful connections with incredibly deep personalities. Whether you’re looking to make new friends or something more, there’s a whole cast of characters just dying to meet you!

name: R is for Rachel
description: A romance about falling in love for the first time, while suffering from social anxiety disorder.

name: Sinoepoch
description: Sinoepoch is a grand strategy game based on the historical fantasy of the Three Kingdoms period in Chinese history. In the current version, players can create their character, "travel" to the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty,create their family legends.

name: Rogue Earth
description: Rogue Earth is a unique survival city builder where you prepare for and then face the endless winter. Will you be able to prepare in time? Will you save the spark of human civilization even after the whole planet is ejected out of the Sun's orbit and into the void of space... and at what cost?

name: WTF Do You Know?
description: We just have one question for you... "WTF Do You Know?" I think it might be time for us to find out...

name: Money Run
description: Money Run is a single-player comic book story driven 2D action arcade game that will submerge the player in the atmosphere of vintage noir, dark humour, gangsters and corruption.

name: Xpressorcist
description: A Exorcism Simulator! Take the role of an Xpressorcist (Express Exorcist) and exorcise as many people as possible with out running out of time and accidentally blowing them up!!

name: Sunken Realms
description: Descend into an abandoned underground city to battle orcs, solve puzzles, collect loot, and then return to the surface to upgrade your gear and stats in this modern, old-school dungeon-crawler.

name: Pack My Stuff
description: Pack My Stuff is as simple as that. As an employee of a moving company, help residents in Neuberg move and pack your possessions into moving boxes.

name: Trash Pit
description: A frantic twin stick shooter where you and your enemies are only ever one hit from death. Mow down relentless waves of robots, collect upgrades and claw your way to the highest score you can.

name: Lil Splody: Look Out Below!
description: Zodac and his minions are wreaking havoc! It's up to you to dodge and blow up falling enemies in an attempt to rescue your fellow bomblings!

name: Dungeon: Faster & Deadlier
description: In this singleplayer card game, full of strategic options yet simple mechanics, your brain gets what it craves. Heroes fight under your command in a vast, dark world. They crush their enemies with your prudent judgement, spells, cult items and brute force. Or vice versa.

name: Islands of the Caliph
description: Islands of the Caliph is an old-school RPG with grid based movement set in a fictional island civilization. Thematically it draws on Middle Eastern folklore and religion, offering a lore-rich setting for your character's journey.

name: Rocco's Inferno
description: Rocco's Inferno is a top down, narrative role playing game inspired by The Sopranos and the crime films of Martin Scorsese. You play through a day in the life of Rocco Dante, a captain in the Reggiani crime Family. Who will still be living by tomorrow, is up to you.

name: Meet me at Noon
description: Meet me at NooN is a cozy puzzle game with brain-scratching time-loop mechanics. Control two spirits that create time loops each day, learn their different behaviors, how they can interact with each other and how these interactions are interfering with their time loops.

name: Spelldash
description: Spellburst is a fast paced magical FPS game where you control fire, air, ice and lightning elements to use various spells, fight against exotic monsters and explore different planets with parkour and platforming elements

name: Dumb Little Robots
description: Dumb Little Robots is a 2d puzzle game where you control robots that each have a single function. Help them work together to solve tricky levels. Meet new robots as you go and learn how they change the possibilities!

name: Ballads of Hongye
description: "Ballads of Hongye" is a unique city-building game. Unlike the conventional city-building games, lands in Ballads of Hongye are expanded by finishing the challenges in a limited time. Once you own the lands, you can take your time to build your dream oriental city with over 150 different buildings.

name: Exodemic
description: Destroy aliens, dash between planets, and buy powerful upgrades. Exodemic is a compact roguelike that combines frenetic shoot 'em up gameplay with a procedurally generated overworld filled with vendors, trading hubs, and combat encounters. Race against the clock to save the human race.

name: ElbmarKs
description: A tribute to the magnificent side-scrolling Arcade shoot’-em-up games with a modern look, physics-based movement, and some challenging twists that will test your speed, reflexes, accuracy, patience, and memory at the same time.

name: Aledorn
description: Spiritual successor to many old school hard-core RPG/Dungeon masterpieces, that combines tactical combat system, exploration in the first person view and intriguing travelling system between main map locations.

name: Just Power: The Papal States
description: Are you ready to found a dynasty which controls the Holy See over the centuries? Climb the hierarchies, hire your relatives, blackmail and bribe to get everything you want in this turn-based political simulator.

name: Magical Harvest
description: In this 3D-fantasy farming game you are the one who wants to save the world of Hyldena from the loss of all magic. While exploring Hyldena, you will be able to evolve plants and animals into magical variations and even learn how to use magic yourself with alchemy.

name: Fight of Steel: Infinity Warrior
description: Fight of Steel: Infinity Warrior is a new fighting game with ultimate freedom. Players will have the opportunity to customize their own fighter from the appearance to fighting moves.

name: Dreams in the Witch House
description: Dreams in the Witch House is an open world horror adventure game, where you guide Walter Gilman, as he prepares to face the dreaded May-Eve witch ritual in the legend-haunted city of Arkham. Choose your own approach and reveal the secret of the Witch House before it's too late.

name: Stone Mirth on Earth
description: Stone Mirth on Earth is a comedy fantasy point and click adventure in which you will take on the role of Stone Mirth, the volcanic stone from Mars who has to save the earth from an evil stone in order to return to his home planet and prove himself a hero.

name: Raccoon Crafts Factory
description: Raccoon Crafts Factory is a game about creating automated factories to produce things of increasing complexity, within an endless 2D world - Use your imagination to design factories, combine simple elements into complex structures.

name: Hero Chest
description: The perfect combination of Roguelike, Hack Slash and Card Game! In Hero Chest you are an angry chest that got tired of being looted and decided to finish them all! With powers and special cards create the dungeon and strategize to reach your goal. An adventure full of combat and gold!

name: Contrablade World
description: Speed through a vast open world and experience incredible battles while you advance your Contrablade in a quest to challenge and beat the mythical gods. A brand new adventure RPG in the unique action physics fighting franchise Contrablade.

name: Space Ballers
description: Space Ballers it's a game between ships that aims to score the most number of goals in challenging arenas with many obstacles along the way.

name: Lulu Way
description: Lulu the little astronaut is trapped in space. Help Lulu escape eternal limbo by jumping from one block to another, solving uniquely crafted puzzles is the only way!

name: Jumbo: Jewel of Realms
description: Welcome to Jumbo: Jewel of Realms, an action-platformer adventure! Embark on a quest from Bloom Town that would take you against countless of formidable foes – interact with a variety of unique characters with their own stories and discover the secrets of the Jewel of Realms.

name: Dreamlined
description: Dreamlined is a physics-based automation/destruction game about building machines and crushing dreams.

name: Adamstown
description: Adamstown is a casual, strategy and puzzle, city builder. Create endless towns full of cars and people. Explore new puzzle types and unlock more challenging modes.

name: Fynite
description: Welcome to Fynite, a backrooms horror / thriller game. You've noclipped into the backrooms getting out isn't likely, do you have what it takes?

name: Astrolander
description: Astrolander is a fast-paced twist-filled local co-op game inspired by Lunar Lander! 2 players control 1 rocket: Use thrusters, rotation, & special abilities to solve puzzles, whiz around obstacles, & dodge enemies. Test your skills & your friendships!

name: Vedette
description: You are the head of an experimental anti-crime task force in the city of Osteria. Use search history, recent emails, and criminal backgrounds to determine whether an individual is likely to commit a crime. The choices you make will have a significant impact on the entire city’s future.

name: Necore Warriors
description: Necore Warriors is a short turn-based strategy game, battle through ten strategic levels and discover the story behind the realm's greatest war!

name: Mira: The Legend of the Djinns
description: An epic 2D pixel art style Metroidvania, inspired by Moroccan culture and spiritual traditions. Wield powerful ancient weapons and forge your way through unrelenting deserts, crumbling necropoli, floating islands and dangerous mountains as you try to uncover the secret of the last Djinn.

name: Raven
description: Go to your happy place with Raven: A relaxing, trick-taking card game. Embrace the serene atmosphere while trumping your AI opponents. Win the bid, choose trumps and play cards to win points for your team.

name: Rail Walkers
description: Rail Walker, noun, a semi autonomous rail-mounted turret attack weapon. Defend against the swarms of intelligent insects threatening your mining infrastructure. Construct rail tracks, strategically move, repair, recharge, reload and upgrade your rail walkers in the battle against these enemy waves.

name: Multi Idle
description: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

name: Dead End City
description: A post-apocalyptic arcade shooter. Collect fuel and dodge enemy fire as you fight back against the evil Scorpio gang. Mixes cars, shmups and themes that would have been right at home in 80's anime and arcades..

name: Godscyld
description: A coop action RPG for 1-4 players, you are one of few Sin-Eaters who can control the corruption and power of Sin. It turned our gods against each other, against the world, against us. Hunt demon bosses, to regain control of the world.

name: Magirune 2
description: While mining in the search of water, an artifact is found. Learn the secret of this world in this casual dungeon crawler.

name: Cat Powered UFO
description: Cat Powered UFO is a blend of turn-based RPG combat and old-school Zelda top-down action. Collect cats, visit crazy dimensions, and be a jerk to NPCs. Find combos of "Illegal bonuses" to break the combat system! Cat Powered UFO is a quirky and light-hearted game with a self-aware sense of humor.

name: Potatoes
description: Potatoes is a puzzle/platformer game in which you control multiple characters by recording what should they do. Make potatoes collaborate to reach the objective in 50 different levels of increasing difficulty!

name: CEO
description: Play the CEO of a multi-national conglomerate in this business simulation. Grow crops, raise livestock, build mines and oil wells to get the raw resources needed to make more than 75 types of consumer goods.

name: The Enjenir
description: In this light hearted physics based building game, you are a clumsy medieval engineer. The game combines gridless sandbox building with hilarious physics driven third person controls. With infinite structural design possibilities - the only limit is your imagination… oh, and gravity!
